programme.channel: USA | Showtime Family Zone East HD
programme.title: The Promise
programme.desc: This sumptuous historical drama, set in Constantinople on the verge of World War I, centers on a love triangle between an artist from France, an American journalist and an Armenian medical student who is engaged to a woman from his home village.

programme.channel: USA | Showtime Family Zone East HD
programme.title: Finding Neverland
programme.desc: Seven Oscar nominations, including Best Picture and Best Actor went to this magical portrait of Scottish playwright J.M. Barrie. The film chronicles his relationship with a young widow and her sons, which inspired "Peter Pan."

programme.channel: USA | Showtime Family Zone East HD
programme.title: After Yang
programme.desc: After Yang tells the tale of a future where robotic children are purchased as live-in babysitters. Jake and Kyra are the parents of Mika. When Mika's beloved android companion Yang malfunctions, Jake desperately searches for a way to repair him. Along the way, he discovers that his relationships with his wife and child have become distant. The journey takes him on a pathway of rediscovery, allowing him to close that distance and recapture the life that was passing before him.

programme.channel: USA | Showtime Family Zone East HD
programme.title: The Giver
programme.desc: In this thrilling adaptation of the beloved novel, a young man living in a totalitarian society learns the true history of his community from a mysterious yet seemingly benevolent figure known as the Giver. In time, the youth finds the burden of the truth too great to bear and plots to escape.

programme.channel: USA | Showtime Family Zone East HD
programme.title: Adam Sandler's Eight Crazy Nights
programme.desc: A partying troublemaker learns about holiday spirit when a judge sentences him to community service as a referee for a kids team.

programme.channel: USA | Showtime Family Zone East HD
programme.title: Six Minutes to Midnight
programme.desc: Summer 1939. The Nazi High Command send their daughters to finishing school in England. A teacher senses the coming atrocities, but must navigate a web of double-agents to raise the alarm.

programme.channel: USA | Showtime Family Zone East HD
programme.title: Downhill Racer
programme.desc: Robert Redford as an egotist skiing with the U.S. team in Europe. Fine skiing footage; filmed on location. Gene Hackman, Camilla Sparv, Jim McMullan. D.K.: Kenneth Kirk. Mayo: Dabney Coleman. Machet: Karl Michael Vogler. Tommy: Joe Jay Albert. Directed by Michael Ritchie.

programme.channel: USA | Showtime Family Zone East HD
programme.title: The Real Charlie Chaplin
programme.desc: A raw and striking portrait of noteworthy silent film actor Charlie Chaplin. Never-before-seen clips from Chaplin's candid interview with Life Magazine in 1966 sheds light on the actor's upbringing and unexpected foray into the entertainment industry. The interview, woven together with clips from Chaplin's films, provides a meditation on Chaplin's impact on Hollywood from the actor's own perspective.

programme.channel: USA | Showtime Family Zone East HD
programme.title: Perfect in '76
programme.desc: A look at the 1976 Indiana Hoosiers basketball team, led by coach Bobby Knight, that posted a perfect 32-0 record on their way to winning the NCAA national championship.

programme.channel: USA | Showtime Family Zone East HD
programme.title: Menashe
programme.desc: This moving drama centers on a Hasidic Jewish man living in New York City who fights to retain custody of his son after his wife's death, as tradition dictates that the boy must be raised in a household with a mother. If he doesn't remarry quickly, his son will be adopted by his late spouse's stern brother.

programme.channel: USA | Showtime Family Zone East HD
programme.title: Debunkers, Inc.
programme.desc: Three goofballs start a detective agency at their high school.

programme.channel: USA | Showtime Family Zone East HD
programme.title: Imagine That
programme.desc: This winning family film stars Eddie Murphy as an ambitious financial whiz who sacrifices time with his 7-year-old daughter (Yara Shahidi) for the sake of his job. One day his daughter's imaginary world unexpectedly helps his career, prompting him to improve their strained relationship. Directed by Karey Kirkpatrick. Thomas Haden Church, Ronny Cox, Martin Sheen.

programme.channel: USA | Showtime Family Zone East HD
programme.title: Ernest Saves Christmas
programme.desc: Ernest scrambles to find a successor for Santa Claus in this Yuletide comedy.

programme.channel: USA | Showtime Family Zone East HD
programme.title: Our Ghosts
programme.desc: Evicted from their apartment, a father and son try to scare new tenants.

programme.channel: USA | Showtime Family Zone East HD
programme.title: Queen Bees
programme.desc: This comedy film follows a strong-willed and independent senior who moves temporarily into Pine Grove Senior Community, a local retirement community whilst her house undergoes repairs. But as her eyes are opened to making new friends, hobbies, and perhaps even romance, she encounters some residents that remind her of high school cliques all over again.

programme.channel: USA | Showtime Family Zone East HD
programme.title: The War With Grandpa
programme.desc: When Grandpa Ed comes to stay, his grandson Peter must give up his beloved bedroom. However, Peter does not give way so easily, concocting a series of unexpected and unusual schemes to force his imposing grandfather out of his room for good. Based on the novel by Robert Kimmel Smith.

programme.channel: USA | Showtime Family Zone East HD
programme.title: The Farewell
programme.desc: After her beloved grandmother is diagnosed with terminal cancer, a Chinese-American woman returns to China for a family gathering secretly designed to say goodbye to the matriarch. However, when it becomes apparent that grandma is the only one unaware of the diagnosis, she struggles to keep the secret.

programme.channel: USA | Showtime Family Zone East HD
programme.title: The Sting
programme.desc: Paul Newman and Robert Redford star as Depression-era con men out to fool a big-time criminal in this Best Picture Oscar winner.

programme.channel: USA | Showtime Family Zone East HD
programme.title: Leap of Faith
programme.desc: A charlatan claiming to be a faith healer is stranded in a backwater town in Kansas where a local sheriff gets wise to his scam.

programme.channel: USA | Showtime Family Zone East HD
programme.title: Mandela: Long Walk to Freedom
programme.desc: Based on South African president Nelson Mandela's autobiography, this inspiring docudrama chronicles Mandela's youth, education and the nearly three decades he spent in prison before becoming the nation's president, as well as his role in rebuilding the country post-apartheid.

programme.channel: USA | Showtime Family Zone East HD
programme.title: The Evers
programme.desc: Family members discuss the life and legacy of civil rights activist Medgar Evers, former Field Secretary of the NAACP in Mississippi whose fight for freedom was tragically cut short by an assassin's bullet in 1963.

programme.channel: USA | Showtime Family Zone East HD
programme.title: Meek's Cutoff
programme.desc: In this historical drama set in 1845, Stephen Meek (Bruce Greenwood) gets three pioneer families lost after being hired to guide them through the Oregon Trail, which leads to division and mistrust as the group fights for survival in the wilderness.

programme.channel: USA | Showtime Family Zone East HD
programme.title: Love Means Zero
programme.desc: Featuring the life and work of American tennis coach Nick Bollettieri.

programme.channel: USA | Showtime Family Zone East HD
programme.title: Genie's Tail, A
programme.desc: A young boy's puppy unearths a genie's lamp housing two Genie brothers. When the boy wishes one of the Genies into the puppy, magical mayhem ensues.

programme.channel: USA | Showtime Family Zone East HD
programme.title: Saving Flora
programme.desc: A circus Elephant named Flora who can no longer perform her tricks is scheduled to be euthanized. However, the night before, Dawn, the circus owner's 14-year-old daughter, escapes from the circus together with Flora to take her away from danger. Dawn's mission is to take Flora to the elephant preserve where she will be safe from any harm. To achieve it, they will need to make it through kilometers of woods, an enraged river, and two elephant hunters.

programme.channel: USA | Showtime Family Zone East HD
programme.title: Muhammad Ali: The Greatest. Of All Time.
programme.desc: Muhammad Ali talks a suicidal stranger down from a ledge, using his unique brand of wit and wisdom.

programme.channel: USA | Showtime Family Zone East HD
programme.title: The House of Mirth
programme.desc: Strong performances, gorgeous costumes and sumptuous art direction distinguish this adaptation of Edith Wharton's novel. Gillian Anderson stars as a unmarried woman who falls from grace in early 20th-century New York City, where the upper classes have little use for an independent female who refuses to play by the rules. Eric Stoltz, Anthony LaPaglia, Laura Linney, Dan Aykroyd, Elizabeth McGovern.

programme.channel: USA | Showtime Family Zone East HD
programme.title: Twilight
programme.desc: Stephenie Meyer's romantic and suspenseful best seller that started the phenomenon comes to life in this action-packed chronicle of the modern-day love story between a teenage girl and a vampire. Kristen Stewart and Robert Pattinson star. Billy Burke, Peter Facinelli, Elizabeth Reaser. Directed by Catherine Hardwicke.

programme.channel: USA | Showtime Family Zone East HD
programme.title: The Twilight Saga: New Moon
programme.desc: This thrilling second installment of the popular "Twilight" saga finds Bella Swan in pieces after her vampire boyfriend leaves town. She soon reconnects with a childhood friend and realizes he's hiding a dark secret that may hold the key to her survival.

programme.title: Mousehunt
programme.desc: In this wacky kid-friendly romp, the unlucky Smuntz brothers (Nathan Lane, Lee Evans) inherit a mansion and discover that there's a mouse living on the premises. Unfortunately, the tiny and tenacious tenant has no intention of leaving.

programme.title: Lemony Snicket's A Series of Unfortunate Events
programme.desc: Jim Carrey's vibrant turn ignites this highly imaginative, dark-humored fantasy. Three plucky orphans are sent to live with a distant relative---the dastardly and greedy Count Olaf, who plots to steal the children's considerable inheritance. Based on Daniel Handler's books, the film won an Oscar for Best Makeup and features narration by Jude Law.

programme.title: A Christmas Carol
programme.desc: Adaptation of the classic Dickens tale of miserly Ebenezer Scrooge, who is visited by the ghosts of past, present and future Christmases.

programme.title: The Muppets Take Manhattan
programme.desc: Jim Henson's Muppets invade the Big Apple in hopes of bringing their show to the Great White Way.

programme.title: Muppets From Space
programme.desc: Gonzo steps into his first starring role in this extraterrestrial adventure in which he discovers that his long-lost relatives are from a distant planet. Kermit the Frog, Miss Piggy, Fozzie Bear and many other beloved Muppet characters are also on hand, along with the usual host of celebrity cameos.

programme.title: Lemony Snicket's A Series of Unfortunate Events

programme.title: The Out-of-Towners
programme.desc: An Ohio advertising exec heads to New York City for a clandestine job interview, but when his wife joins him for a spontaneous trip, they experience a long series of humiliating misadventures in this hilarious remake.

programme.title: Eye for an Eye
programme.desc: Sally Field gives a strong performance in John Schlesinger's drama about a mother's fight for justice after her daughter is brutally killed. The film opens shockingly as Karen McCann (Field) hears her daughter's murder over the phone. The killer (Kiefer Sutherland) is set free on a technicality, so Karen takes matters into her own hands. Ed Harris, Beverly D'Angelo, Joe Mantegna.

programme.title: Flesh and Bone
programme.desc: A Texas man struggles to come to terms with his father's murderous past. A drifter helps him put himself back together, but complications arise when he realizes how she's linked to his father's criminal acts.

programme.title: Cousins
programme.desc: Two unhappily married relatives begin to fake an affair only to actually become drawn together. American remake of the French hit "Cousin Cousine."

programme.title: Racing With the Moon
programme.desc: A bittersweet love story, set in 1942 California, about two buddies (Sean Penn, Nicolas Cage) and their sweethearts. Elizabeth McGovern, John Karlen, Rutanya Alda, Max Showalter, Kate Williamson. Directed by Richard Benjamin.

programme.title: A Christmas Carol
programme.desc: Adaptation of the classic Dickens tale of miserly Ebenezer Scrooge, who is visited by the ghosts of past, present and future Christmases.

Kermit the Frog, Miss Piggy, Fozzie Bear and many other beloved Muppet characters are also on hand, along with the usual host of celebrity cameos.

programme.title: We're No Angels
programme.desc: Robert De Niro and Sean Penn as escaped convicts masquerading as monks. Demi Moore, Hoyt Axton. Deputy: Bruno Kirby. Warden: Ray McAnally. Bobby: James Russo. Translator: Wallace Shawn.

programme.title: Naked Gun 33 1/3: The Final Insult
programme.desc: More inspired silliness finds Lt. Drebin coaxed out of retirement to take down Rocco the terrorist. After going undercover and assisting in a Shawshank style prison break, Drebin discovers Rocco has access to powerful explosives and his target is the Academy Awards ceremony.

programme.title: Dirty Rotten Scoundrels
programme.desc: Con men, both working the Riviera, trample on each other's turf; they make a bet that will force one of them to leave.

programme.title: Ace Ventura: Pet Detective
programme.desc: An obnoxious private detective who specializes in recovering lost pets is hired to find the Miami Dolphins' missing mascot, and ends up searching for some of the team's players after they go missing as well.

programme.title: Ace Ventura: When Nature Calls
programme.desc: The pet detective travels to Africa to locate a rare bat that is sacred to rival tribals.

programme.title: Naked Gun 33 1/3: The Final Insult
programme.desc: More inspired silliness finds Lt. Drebin coaxed out of retirement to take down Rocco the terrorist. After going undercover and assisting in a Shawshank style prison break, Drebin discovers Rocco has access to powerful explosives and his target is the Academy Awards ceremony.

programme.title: Dickie Roberts: Former Child Star
programme.desc: David Spade is a hoot in this clever satire about a '70s TV icon who is desperately searching for another shot at fame and fortune. Mary McCormack and Jon Lovitz costar. The film is a Who's Who of former child stars, including Alyssa Milano, Danny Bonaduce, Willie Aames, Fred Berry, Todd Bridges, Barry Williams, Dustin Diamond, Tony Dow and Corey Feldman.

programme.title: Attack of the 50 Foot Cheerleader
programme.desc: An aspiring cheerleader takes an experimental drug that will improve her chances of making her college pep squad, but the side effects cause her to grow to a towering height.

programme.title: Marathon Man
programme.desc: A graduate student is thrust into a violent encounter with a Nazi war criminal in NYC. In an effort to locate a cache of missing gems, the former Nazi dentist tries to extract information from the student by performing sadistic "oral surgery" on him.

programme.title: Summer Rental
programme.desc: A harried suburbanite gets into a number of misadventures during a family vacation that culminates in a boat race.

programme.title: The Dictator
programme.desc: In this hilarious comedy, a brutal dictator is forced to survive on his own in NYC after his right-hand man launches a coup and attempts to assassinate him. In time, he befriends the feminist owner of an organic-food store and schemes to reclaim power.

programme.title: Dirty Rotten Scoundrels
programme.desc: Con men, both working the Riviera, trample on each other's turf; they make a bet that will force one of them to leave.

programme.title: Ace Ventura: Pet Detective
programme.desc: An obnoxious private detective who specializes in recovering lost pets is hired to find the Miami Dolphins' missing mascot, and ends up searching for some of the team's players after they go missing as well.

programme.title: Ace Ventura: When Nature Calls
programme.desc: The pet detective travels to Africa to locate a rare bat that is sacred to rival tribals.

programme.title: Black Sunday
programme.desc: Lander, a crazed Vietnam veteran, teams up with the Black September terrorist group to plot an attack at the Super Bowl in Miami, where the stadium is packed with 80,000 fans and the president. An Israeli military officer is forced into a desperate race against time to halt the attack before thousands of innocent civilians die.

programme.title: Popstar: Never Stop Never Stopping
programme.desc: A hugely popular rapper faces a career meltdown when his latest album tanks and his attempts to rehab his image only end in disaster. In time, he considers reuniting with his old rap trio, the Style Boyz, in this hysterical, fast-paced mockumentary.

programme.title: Atsuko Okatsuka: The Intruder
programme.desc: Comedian and actress Atsuko Okatsuka brings her brand of ingenious, offbeat storytelling to the Elsewhere stage in Brooklyn where she dishes on the futile art of impressing teenagers, attending a "Magic Mike Live" show with her grandmother, and the alarming reactions that she and her husband had to the unwanted presence of an intruder.

programme.title: The Matrix Resurrections
programme.desc: This sci-fi series sequel revisits Neo, who seems to be feeling disconnected from his reality as he discusses his personal issues with a therapist-like Analyst. As he's also apparently taking some blue pills, people from his past start reappearing, offering him a red pill and some missing truths about his actual reality.

programme.title: Hard Knocks In Season: Arizona Cardinals
The Maze Runner
programme.desc: A group of amnesiac teens awaken in a deadly maze, and search desperately for an escape route while gathering clues that could reveal the reason for their imprisonment in this thrilling adaptation of the best-selling YA novel. Meanwhile, dreams of a shadowy organization hint at a sinister agenda.

programme.title: Red Eye
programme.desc: On a night flight to Miami, a hotel manager (Rachel McAdams) becomes a pawn in a plot to assassinate the Deputy Secretary of Homeland Security. Horror master Wes Craven (the "Scream" movies) directed this nail-biting suspense thriller. Cillian Murphy, Brian Cox, Jayma Mays.

programme.title: Armageddon
programme.desc: Bruce Willis, Billy Bob Thornton and Ben Affleck star in this action-packed thrill ride. Desperate to stop a gigantic asteroid from wiping out humanity, NASA recruits misfit oil drillers to deliver a nuclear bomb that will blow up the massive rock. Jerry Bruckheimer produced and Michael Bay directed. Steve Buscemi, Liv Tyler, Keith David, Will Patton, Owen Wilson.

programme.title: The Full Monty
programme.desc: In this delightful, Oscar-nominated comedy, unemployed, out-of-shape English steel workers decide to take up exotic dancing after seeing the success of the Chippendale Dancers. They practice their bumping and grinding and plot to strip down to nothing---all the while trying to summon the courage to face the truth about their individual lives. Robert Carlyle, Tom Wilkinson, Mark Addy.

programme.title: Garden State
programme.desc: Zach Braff wrote, directed and stars in this quirky comedy-drama. He plays a slacker who must confront his estranged New Jersey family when he returns home for his mother's funeral.

programme.title: Hard Knocks In Season: Arizona Cardinals
Red
programme.desc: Retired CIA hit man Frank Moses (Bruce Willis) and his former colleagues race to find out why they've been targeted for death by their former organization and uncover a conspiracy implicating some prominent politicians in this rousing action comedy.

programme.title: Dune
programme.desc: This version of Frank Herbert's popular 1965 sci-fi novel is the first of a two-part adaptation. This story covers only the first half of the novel and features Paul Atreides, whose duke father, Leto, accepts the stewardship of a planet called Arrakis. Since it's the main source of a most coveted substance called the melange, the leadership of its mining industry has been contentious, which the heir of the House Atreides will soon find out.

programme.title: The Suicide Squad
programme.desc: The shadowy operation Task Force X recruits notorious criminals Bloodsport, Harley Quinn, and Peacemaker to assemble a rag-tag team of their most volatile compatriots from the Belle Reve prison for a secretive mission to Corto Maltese island. Yet the anti-heroes only find themselves embroiled in a conflict against a horde of powerful foes eager to cause their violent demise.

programme.title: His Dark Materials
programme.desc: Lyra and Will try to escape the Land of the Dead. Asriel and Mrs. Coulter make a shocking discovery.

programme.title: Don't Worry Darling
programme.desc: In the 1950s, several couples live in an experimental community founded upon utopian principles. At the heart of it all are Alice and Jack, seemingly content in their marital bliss. Yet Alice's grip on reality slowly begins to unravel as she grows increasingly suspicious of her husband and the secrets harbored by his employers.

programme.title: Branson
programme.desc: The history of Virgin Galactic, from conception to test flights, and the controversial bid from Virgin Atlantic to obtain government support during the Covid-19 pandemic. As the first passenger flight of Virgin Galactic approaches, Branson defends the benefits of privately funded space exploration and the paradoxes around Virgin's eco-messaging. Set for July 11, 2021, the launch day follows 17 years of research, testing, accidents, and setbacks, culminating in a successful flight.

programme.title: Jurassic Park III
programme.desc: Sam Neill is back as paleontologist Alan Grant for another wild walk in the park. William H. Macy and Tea Leoni costar as a couple whose son is lost on a remote dino-infested island. Posing as wealthy adventurers, they lure Grant to the island to help in their search, and all three get much more than they bargained for. The special effects are outstanding. Alessandro Nivola, Trevor Morgan, Michael Jeter.

programme.title: Branson
programme.desc: The history of Virgin Galactic, from conception to test flights, and the controversial bid from Virgin Atlantic to obtain government support during the Covid-19 pandemic. As the first passenger flight of Virgin Galactic approaches, Branson defends the benefits of privately funded space exploration and the paradoxes around Virgin's eco-messaging. Set for July 11, 2021, the launch day follows 17 years of research, testing, accidents, and setbacks, culminating in a successful flight.

programme.title: Jeff, Who Lives at Home
programme.desc: Slacker Jeff (Jason Segel) lives with his mom, smokes pot and waits for the universe to give him a sign about what to do with his life. Over the course of a day, he reconnects with his estranged brother, who is having serious marriage problems. Meanwhile, their widowed mother gets a second chance at love. Directed by the Duplass brothers.

programme.title: Random Acts of Flyness
programme.sub-title: Third Dimension: G/d Does Not Submit & Other Applicab
programme.desc: With her other man Xavier in tow, Najja heads out of town to her "sister's" re-birthday to embark on a spirit wave collusion (F.K.A. Ritual) to be reborn, revealed, and healed. But the ancestors always got a trick up their sleeve, trust and believe.

programme.title: Random Acts of Flyness
programme.desc: While working on Ajjan, Terence and Najja hit a roadblock that flight nor teleportation can solve – and turn to couples therapy for guidance. Later, they plan a parallel journey back to The Source.

programme.title: HBO First Look: Empire of Light
programme.desc: An inside look at Sam Mendes' romantic drama starring Olivia Colman, Micheal Ward, Monica Dolan, Tom Brooke, Tanya Moodie, Hannah Onslow, Crystal Clarke, Toby Jones, and Colin Firth.

programme.title: Jurassic Park
programme.desc: Genetically engineered dinosaurs run amok on a remote island in this special-effects extravaganza. It's up to a paleontologist, a paleobotanist and a mathematician to outmaneuver the deadly beasts and find their way back to civilization. Based on Michael Crichton's best seller. The film won three Oscars, including Best Visual Effects.

programme.title: Downton Abbey
programme.desc: The Crawley family prepares for an official royal visit to their family house in Yorkshire in 1927. They experience physical, social, and psychological upheavals as King George V, Queen Mary, and their royal entourage descend on the eponymous mansion.

programme.title: Master and Commander: The Far Side of the World
programme.desc: A British ship captain and his crew battle a French vessel during the Napoleonic Wars. Eventually, the pursuit leads the two ships on an adrenaline-charged chase through the distant reaches of the sea.

programme.title: Harriet
programme.desc: The incredible true story of one of America's greatest heroes, Harriet Tubman. From her escape from slavery to the dangerous missions she led, setting free hundreds of slaves through the Underground Railroad.

programme.title: King Richard
programme.desc: Family man Richard Williams recognizes the athletic prowess brimming in his daughters Venus and Serena, inspiring him to develop an unorthodox training plan to propel the girls to international recognition as Black female tennis aces. Based on a true story.

programme.title: His Dark Materials
programme.desc: Lyra and Will try to escape the Land of the Dead. Asriel and Mrs. Coulter make a shocking discovery.

programme.title: X2
programme.desc: Director Bryan Singer reassembles the cast of his 2000 adaptation of the Marvel comic. This time, Prof. Xavier forms an alliance with his rival, Magneto, to fight a plot to eliminate mutants hatched by a crazed government scientist.

programme.title: The New Mutants
programme.desc: When Illyana, Rahne, Sam, Danielle, and Roberto — five teenage mutants who are just discovering their superhuman abilities — are held inside an isolated hospital to be psychologically monitored, strange occurrences begin to happen. As events intensify, they find themselves embarking on a mission to escape the facility and save their lives, putting their newfound friendship and powers to the ultimate test.

programme.desc: An examination of the process of making movies follows a production from script to screen.

programme.desc: Spoof of classic Hollywood private-eye capers, with Michael Caine as a bumbling detective searching for a man's long-lost daughter in 1940s Los Angeles. Natalie Wood, Michael Constantine, Kitty Winn, Thayer David, Dorothy Adams. Peter Hyams directed.

programme.title: Intent to Kill
programme.desc: Assassins try to kill a South American president in a hospital. Richard Todd. Nancy: Betsy Drake. McNeill: Alexander Knox. Menda: Herbert Lom. Finch: Warren Stevens. Carla: Lisa Gastoni. Well directed by Jack Cardiff.

programme.title: From the Terrace
programme.desc: Adaptation of John O'Hara's novel about the loveless marriage of a socialite (Joanne Woodward) and a man (Paul Newman) dedicated to his career. Martha: Myrna Loy. Eaton: Leon Ames. Porter: George Grizzard. Natalie: Ina Balin. Hardie: Felix Aylmer. Clemmie: Barbara Eden. Jim: Patrick O'Neal. Directed by Mark Robson.

programme.title: Holiday for Lovers
programme.desc: The adventures of a Boston family in Brazil, with Clifton Webb as a father who disapproves of his daughters' romances. Jane Wyman, Jill St. John, Carol Lynley. Barroso: Paul Henreid. Paul: Gary Crosby. Carlos: Nico Minardos. GI: Gardner McKay. Jose Greco: Himself. Light, good-natured family fun. Directed by Henry Levin.

programme.desc: Two roles for Danny Kaye: an American entertainer and a French hero, with mix-ups resulting. Gene Tierney, Corinne Calvet. Lebrix: Marcel Dalio. Dancers: Ellen Ray, Gwen Verdon. Periton: Jean Murat. Gapeaux: Sig Ruman. Walter Lang directed.

programme.title: Dear Brigitte
programme.desc: An 8-year-old (Billy Mumy) has a passion for Brigitte Bardot. Harmless family fare. James Stewart, Glynis Johns, Fabian. Pandora: Cindy Carol. Captain: Ed Wynn. Directed by Henry Koster.

programme.desc: Spoof of classic Hollywood private-eye capers, with Michael Caine as a bumbling detective searching for a man's long-lost daughter in 1940s Los Angeles. Natalie Wood, Michael Constantine, Kitty Winn, Thayer David, Dorothy Adams. Peter Hyams directed.

programme.title: Taxi
programme.desc: High-octane action and rollicking humor drive this buddy film. After losing his driver's license, a bumbling cop (Jimmy Fallon) teams up with a brassy cabbie (Queen Latifah) so he can pursue a team of women bank robbers led by a comely Brazilian (Gisele Bundchen). Based on the 1998 French film "Taxi," which was written by Luc Besson. Jennifer Esposito, Ann-Margret.

programme.title: Blockers
programme.desc: Meddling parents discover that their three teenage daughters have made a pact to lose their virginities on prom night. They decide to intervene and stop them by following the girls during the night's various wild festivities.

programme.title: Deadpool
programme.desc: In this irreverent spin on the superhero genre, a mercenary reinvents himself as a wisecracking antihero called Deadpool after an experiment leaves him with advanced healing powers and a disfigured face. He then sets out to seek revenge on those responsible for his transformation.

programme.desc: In this irreverent spin on the superhero genre, a mercenary reinvents himself as a wisecracking antihero called Deadpool after an experiment leaves him with advanced healing powers and a disfigured face. He then sets out to seek revenge on those responsible for his transformation.

programme.title: Taxi
programme.desc: High-octane action and rollicking humor drive this buddy film. After losing his driver's license, a bumbling cop (Jimmy Fallon) teams up with a brassy cabbie (Queen Latifah) so he can pursue a team of women bank robbers led by a comely Brazilian (Gisele Bundchen). Based on the 1998 French film "Taxi," which was written by Luc Besson. Jennifer Esposito, Ann-Margret.

programme.title: The Sentinel
programme.desc: Sparks fly in this riveting thriller about a Secret Service agent investigating his mentor, who is suspected of plotting to assassinate the president while having an affair with the First Lady. Adapted from the novel by Gerald Petievich, who served in the U.S. Army Intelligence Corps and worked at the Treasury Department.

programme.title: From the Terrace
programme.desc: Adaptation of John O'Hara's novel about the loveless marriage of a socialite (Joanne Woodward) and a man (Paul Newman) dedicated to his career. Martha: Myrna Loy. Eaton: Leon Ames. Porter: George Grizzard. Natalie: Ina Balin. Hardie: Felix Aylmer. Clemmie: Barbara Eden. Jim: Patrick O'Neal. Directed by Mark Robson.

programme.title: Les Misérables
programme.desc: During the early days of the French Revolution, an upstanding man imprisoned for stealing a loaf of bread is pursued relentlessly by one single-minded police officer.

programme.title: Désirée
programme.desc: Fictionalized account of Napoleon's romance with the woman who would become the queen of Sweden.

programme.title: My Cousin Rachel
programme.desc: About the attraction between an enigmatic woman and a vengeful young man.

programme.title: Mother Wore Tights
programme.desc: Fact-based account of the ups and downs of a married vaudeville couple who struggle to raise their two daughters while constantly touring the country. Feataturing an Oscar-winning score.

programme.title: The Model and the Marriage Broker
programme.desc: Thelma Ritter is matchmaker to Jeanne Crain and Scott Brady. Witty script; directed by George Cukor. Zero Mostel, Michael O'Shea.

programme.title: Blockers
programme.desc: Meddling parents discover that their three teenage daughters have made a pact to lose their virginities on prom night. They decide to intervene and stop them by following the girls during the night's various wild festivities.

programme.title: Why Him?
programme.desc: An adoring dad is horrified to discover that his daughter's tech-billionaire boyfriend is a tattooed, party-hearty lout. Despite the latter's heart of gold, the father refuses to warm to him—especially when he learns about his engagement plans.

programme.title: Life of Pi

programme.title: Big Game

programme.title: Phone Booth
programme.desc: Following Stuart Shepard, a New York publicist who, after using a pay phone to call his mistress, finds himself on the wrong end of a terrifying call.

programme.title: Love & Mercy

programme.desc: Best Actor Oscar nominee Johnny Depp perfectly embodies the title role in Tim Burton's bloody well-done adaptation of the Stephen Sondheim musical about the vengeful owner of a tonsorial parlor that offers customers more than just a shave and a haircut. Helena Bonham Carter costars as Mrs. Lovett, who makes a killing with her new pie recipe containing a special meaty ingredient.

programme.title: Total Recall
programme.desc: A 21st-century construction worker discovers that his entire memory of the past derives from a chip implanted in his brain.

programme.title: Smokin' Aces
programme.desc: This explosive, energetic crime opus, set in a glitzy Lake Tahoe hotel, rides shotgun with a wild collection of assassins as they gun for lowlife magician Buddy "Aces" Israel (Jeremy Piven), who is turning state's evidence against the mob. Ben Affleck, Ray Liotta, Ryan Reynolds, Taraji Henson, Andy Garcia, Peter Berg. Wayne Newton has a cameo as himself. Singer Alicia Keys and rapper Common make their big-screen debuts. Written and directed by Joe Carnahan.

programme.title: Alfie
programme.desc: Jude Law defines charisma in this funny, insightful and sometimes poignant portrait of an unabashed philanderer. Law plays Alfie, a Manhattan chauffeur who begins to reevaluate his shallow ideas about women and romance. The comedy-drama is a remake of the 1966 Michael Caine film of the same name. Marisa Tomei, Susan Sarandon, Jane Krakowski, Nia Long, Omar Epps.

programme.title: What Happens in Vegas
programme.desc: A charming Cameron Diaz stars as an uptight stock trader who meets and marries immature slacker Ashton Kutcher one drunken night in Las Vegas. They agree to an annulment---until he wins a $3 million jackpot with her quarter. Ordered by a judge to live for six months as husband and wife before either can claim the prize, they're bound to fall in love---if they don't kill each other first. Lake Bell

programme.title: The Animal
programme.desc: Rob Schneider is hilarious in this comedy about Marvin Mange, an aspiring cop who undergoes "transspecies" surgery after a car accident. When he recovers, Mange has the physical prowess of a beast and must work feverishly to control his animal instincts if he is to win the heart of a perky environmental activist (Colleen Haskell). John C. McGinley, Edward Asner, Adam Sandler.

programme.title: Next Day Air
programme.desc: A drug shipment is sent to the wrong address, prompting a frantic race to recover the package before its contents are revealed in this hilarious crime comedy. Brody (Mike Epps) and Guch have mistakenly received a package containing 10 kilos of cocaine. If they can just find a buyer, they'll be rich. Meanwhile, intended recipients Jesus and Chita try to track down the shipment before drug lord Bodego Diablo realizes it's missing. But Bodega already knows the score and he wants his drugs.

programme.title: Cobra
programme.desc: An elite cop protects a witness from a murderous cult.

programme.title: The Forgotten

programme.title: Beautiful Creatures
programme.desc: This epic romantic fantasy tells the story of Ethan, a young man who falls for Lena, a new girl in his small town, only to discover she comes from a mysterious family, all of whom all possess supernatural powers. Together, they team up to break a curse that casts Lena's entire future in doubt.

programme.title: Collide

programme.title: The Forever Purge

However, things quickly descend into chaos as the crimes escalate in violence and the death toll continues to rise in this final installment of "The Purge" franchise.

Jessica Biel, Thomas Kretschmann, Tory Kittles. Directed by Lee Tamahori.

programme.title: The Bourne Identity
programme.desc: Matt Damon stars in this well-executed adaptation of Robert Ludlum's bestselling thriller. The story centers on an amnesiac CIA assassin who embarks on a desperate race to save his own life after he is deemed expendable by his superiors. Franka Potente, Chris Cooper, Clive Owen, Brian Cox, Adewale Akinnouye-Agbaje, Julia Stiles.

programme.title: The Bourne Supremacy
programme.desc: In this rip-roaring sequel, amnesiac Jason Bourne is framed for a CIA operation gone wrong. Bourne is then cornered into using his accomplished assassin techniques to fight for survival and clear his name.

programme.title: 10,000 B.C.
programme.desc: Fun prehistoric adventure about a tribe of mammoth hunters. When they're raided by marauders who kidnap survivors to serve as slaves, brave D'Leh leads a rescue party across perilous terrain fraught with saber-toothed tigers and killer dodos.

programme.title: Valkyrie
programme.desc: Tom Cruise stars in the incredible true story of a rebel German army officer who led a plot to assassinate Adolf Hitler and overthrow his ruthless Nazi regime during World War II. Bryan Singer ("X-Men") directs this suspenseful thriller. Kenneth Branagh, Bill Nighy, Tom Wilkinson.

Tension between the two develops as Lucy staunchly opposes the death penalty while Mercy is in favor of it. A drama is set against the backdrop of Lucy's father's death row sentence for the murder of his wife.

programme.title: Marked for Death
programme.desc: A retired DEA agent takes down a Jamaican drug gang that has overrun his hometown.

programme.title: Rain Man
programme.desc: A self-centered man learns he has an autistic older brother he never knew about after their father dies and leaves the older brother the bulk of his multi-million dollar estate. The younger brother takes his institutionalized sibling on a road trip hoping to get some of the money for himself, but soon the two make a genuine connection.

programme.title: Girl with a Pearl Earring
programme.desc: Colin Firth and Scarlett Johansson star in this absorbing, visually rich drama set in the Netherlands during the 1660s. Firth plays painter Johannes Vermeer; Johansson is a maid who becomes his model and the subject of one of his most famous creations. The film scored three Oscar nominations. Tom Wilkinson.

programme.title: Voyagers
programme.desc: Sela and Christopher are part of a 30-person space odyssey that takes place sometime in the near future. The mission includes people from various generations sent out to scope the universe for a possible new home for humans. However, being inside a ship takes its toll on the people inside it, as panic and paranoia take over, unraveling them back to their primal state.

programme.title: Miami Vice
programme.desc: Miami detectives Crockett and Tubbs go undercover to break up a Colombian drug cartel in this stylish and exciting update of the trendy 1980s cop series.

programme.title: Shark Night 3D

programme.title: The Hunted

programme.title: Nick of Time
programme.desc: A mild-mannered accountant is thrown into a nightmare by forces beyond his control when he is randomly chosen by a mysterious duo who make a harrowing demand: Either assassinate the governor of California, or they will kill his 10-year-old daughter.

programme.title: Primal Fear
programme.desc: Richard Gere and Oscar nominee Edward Norton star in this intense courtroom drama. Gere plays slick lawyer Martin Vail, who agrees to defend a guileless 19-year-old (Norton) who has been accused in the brutal murder of the Archbishop of Chicago. Though Vail sees the case as a way to gain publicity, the revelations in the case begin to chill him.

programme.title: American Gigolo
programme.desc: Julian is a stylish and successful male prostitute whose life goes downhill when he's framed for murder after doing a pimp a favor. The only person he can trust is a politician's wife who is frustrated with her husband, and is the only woman he sleeps with who doesn't pay for his services.

programme.title: The General's Daughter
programme.desc: Complex drama about an Army warrant officer (John Travolta) investigating the apparent rape and murder of the daughter of a politically ambitious base commander. Madeleine Stowe. programme.title: Blacklight
programme.desc: An action film following covert government operative Travis Block. Block discovers a major government conspiracy, threatening the lives of U.S. citizens. programme.desc: A dying gunman aims to go out in a blaze of glory while settling old scores and making new friends in turn-of-the-century Nevada..

programme.desc: A widowed small-town pharmacist develops a reticent affection for a spunky divorcé, but soon her ex-husband returns and moves back in with her, claiming things will be different. Based on the novella by Max Schott.

programme.desc: Glenn Ford as a sadistic Army officer out to control post-Civil War Colorado. William Holden, Ellen Drew. Big Ed: Ray Collins. Doc: Edgar Buchanan. Johnny: Jerome Courtland. Jericho: James Millican. Nagel: Jim Bannon. Henry Levin directed.

programme.desc: A cowboy is obsessed with finding the man who sold automatic rifles to the Apaches, resulting in the death of his brother.

programme.desc: The events of the 1885-86 Army campaign against the Apache leader as seen from the viewpoint of a young officer.

But Beckett begins to reconsider the mission when he suspects that his bosses have ulterior motives. Denis Arndt, John Doman, William Duffy.

programme.desc: Kirk Douglas skippers a nuclear aircraft carrier that's time-warped to Pearl Harbor. Martin Sheen, Katharine Ross, James Farentino, Charles Durning. Thurman: Ron O'Neal. Simura: Soon-Teck Oh. Black Cloud: Victor Mohica. Perry: James C. Lawrence. Directed by Don Taylor.

Laurence Fishburne, Olivia Wilde, Joaquim De Almeida, J.R. Villareal.

programme.desc: A man seeks revenge against a former accomplice, now a respected sheriff, who betrayed him, leaving him to be captured and jailed.

programme.title: Northern Lights of Christmas

programme.title: Debbie Macomber's A Mrs. Miracle Christmas
programme.desc: Mrs. Miracle partners with a grieving family to help boost their holiday spirits.

programme.title: Debbie Macomber's Dashing Through the Snow
programme.desc: An airport snafu strands a holiday traveler, so she and a kind stranger share the last rental car and head to Seattle. After some discord, they begin to bond, but that changes when the woman learns her travel buddy is an FBI agent assigned to trail her.

programme.title: The Christmas Bow

programme.title: A Christmas Love Story
programme.desc: NYC youth choir director, Katherine, must write the title song for the Christmas Eve show but becomes distracted when a gifted boy joins her choir unbeknownst to his widowed father Greg.

programme.title: Christmas Homecoming
programme.desc: A military widow rents an apartment to an Army captain recovering from an injury in battle. As they team up to save the town's military museum, they find themselves falling in love.

programme.title: A Homecoming for the Holidays
programme.desc: Country singer Charlotte is home for the holidays and brother Ryan's fellow ex-soldier Matt is in town. Writing her new album, Charlotte works with Matt to build a house for a friend in town. Stars Laura Osnes and Stephen Huszar.

programme.title: Every Time a Bell Rings
programme.desc: Three estranged sisters fulfill their dad's last wish, a Christmas scavenger hunt to find a prized family heirloom, but most importantly, to find each other again.

programme.title: Christmas in Montana
programme.desc: Before the holidays, Sara goes to Montana to help resistant Travis save his ranch.

programme.title: A Gift to Remember
programme.desc: A bicycle collision leaves a pedestrian without his memory, so the cyclist involved helps him try to figure out who he is, and in the process, she takes risks and discovers things about herself.

programme.title: Cherished Memories: A Gift to Remember 2
programme.desc: An unexpected guest and a fight to save the beloved community center unites everyone for an unforgettable holiday.

programme.title: Night at the Museum: Battle of the Smithsonian
programme.desc: Thrills, chills and laughter abound in this adventure comedy about late-night security guard who is put to the test after the exhibits in the Smithsonian come to life and begin wreaking havoc. Determined to save the museum from destruction, Larry takes on a loose T. rex, Attila the Hun and Roman gladiators eager to wage the epic battles of years gone by.

programme.title: A Beautiful Day in the Neighborhood
programme.desc: Lloyd Vogel is tasked with creating a profile of Fred Rogers, the creator and star of the successful children's program Mister Rogers' Neighborhood. He dutifully goes to the studio where his subject is filming his show, and soon enough, he is sitting down with him, asking him probing questions. However, Fred seems to have a different plan in mind. The interviewee suddenly becomes the interviewer, and he starts to help the writer sent for him in unexpected ways.

programme.title: Safe Haven
programme.desc: A reclusive woman starts a new life in a small North Carolina town, and reluctantly falls for a widowed father who helps her confront her troubled past in this affecting romantic drama.

programme.title: Dangerous Liaisons
programme.desc: Camille and Valmont are caught in a dangerous situation after working on a new plan to face their past ghosts.

programme.title: Christmas in Paradise
programme.desc: Three sisters locate their estranged father in a house in the Caribbean. As they enjoy the Christmas sunshine, they work to figure out why he ran away in the first place.

programme.title: Dangerous Liaisons
programme.desc: Camille and Valmont are caught in a dangerous situation after working on a new plan to face their past ghosts.

programme.title: The Unholy
programme.desc: This film based on the novel Shrine by James Herbert sees a journalist investigate the supernatural abilities of a young girl after an alleged visit from the Virgin Mary. Traveling to a small New England town, the journalist begins to uncover a more sinister truth surrounding the girl in this gothic horror film.

programme.title: Moulin Rouge
programme.desc: Nicole Kidman and Ewan McGregor star in this audacious and visually stunning musical romance. Kidman plays Satine, a courtesan and dance-hall performer at the famous Parisian nightclub; McGregor is Christian, the up-and-coming writer who loves her; and John Leguizamo adds superb support as Toulouse-Lautrec. Jim Broadbent, Richard Roxburgh, Kylie Minogue. Baz Luhrmann ("Strictly Ballroom") co-wrote and directed.

programme.title: A Journal for Jordan
programme.desc: In the early 2000s, Charles Monroe King, a sergeant, awaits deployment to Iraq to fight in the war. He is married to Dana, and they recently had a newborn son named Jordan. Dana gifts Charles a journal notebook so he can write to his son his musings and life lessons he wants to share.

programme.title: I'll Find You
programme.desc: Robert is a Catholic opera singer in a relationship with Jewish violinist Rachel. Together, they have dreams of performing at Carnegie Hall. But the German invasion of Poland during World War II separates them, potentially ending this hope. Robert vows that he will find Rachel, journeying into the heart of Nazi Germany and facing the potential tragedy of her being lost to him forever.

programme.title: Safe Haven
programme.desc: A reclusive woman starts a new life in a small North Carolina town, and reluctantly falls for a widowed father who helps her confront her troubled past in this affecting romantic drama.

programme.title: Dangerous Liaisons
programme.desc: Camille and Valmont are caught in a dangerous situation after working on a new plan to face their past ghosts.

programme.title: Rise of the Planet of the Apes
programme.desc: Created in a San Francisco lab by an ambitious father-and-son scientist team seeking to cure Alzheimer's disease, genetically engineered chimp Caesar (Andy Serkis) uses his powerful intellect to lead an ape uprising in this thrilling sci-fi prequel.

programme.desc: In the early 2000s, Charles Monroe King, a sergeant, awaits deployment to Iraq to fight in the war. He is married to Dana, and they recently had a newborn son named Jordan. Dana gifts Charles a journal notebook so he can write to his son his musings and life lessons he wants to share.

Traveling to a small New England town, the journalist begins to uncover a more sinister truth surrounding the girl in this gothic horror film.

programme.title: 22 Jump Street
programme.desc: Schmidt and Jenko go undercover on a college campus, posing as students to bust criminal activity amid the undergrads in this hilarious sequel to the hit comedy "21 Jump Street."

programme.title: Men in Black: International
programme.desc: A new team is protecting the earth from a special kind of shapeshifting alien in this sci-fi comedy adventure. But as two agents attempt to defend the earth against this alien threat, another enemy closer to home penetrates the organization in the form of a mole.

programme.title: Planet of the Apes
programme.desc: Director Tim Burton reimagines the 1968 sci-fi classic in this visually stunning feature set in 2029. Mark Wahlberg stars as an astronaut who crash-lands on a planet where dignified apes rule with an iron fist and subservient humans are treated like chattel. Helena Bonham Carter, Tim Roth, Michael Clarke Duncan, Paul Giamatti, Kris Kristofferson, David Warner, Estella Warren.

programme.title: The Unbearable Weight of Massive Talent
programme.desc: When his money gets tight, actor Nicolas Cage stumbles upon the ideal scheme to earn quick cash when an eccentric billionaire and longtime admirer invites him to make a paid appearance at his upcoming birthday party. Yet unbeknownst to his fan and secret drug runner, Cage doubles as a CIA informant intent on taking down the kingpin's smuggling operation.

programme.title: The Misfits
programme.desc: This action-adventure sees a notorious thief escape maximum security prison only to find himself lured in by The Misfits, an unconventional group of criminals. He learns that the plan is to undertake a huge gold heist and that the owner of the gold is his enemy - the man who put him behind bars.

programme.title: Masquerade
programme.desc: While home alone, Rose comes face-to-face with the young woman's nightmare when a band of thieving thugs breaks into the home, intent on pilfering her family's collection of valuable artwork. Yet Rose's unexpected appearance causes the home invaders to reassess their plans with murderous intent.

programme.title: The Unholy
programme.desc: This film based on the novel Shrine by James Herbert sees a journalist investigate the supernatural abilities of a young girl after an alleged visit from the Virgin Mary. Traveling to a small New England town, the journalist begins to uncover a more sinister truth surrounding the girl in this gothic horror film.

programme.title: Lila and Eve
programme.desc: Two mothers grieve the murders of their respective children. When the police prove incapable of apprehending those responsible, the women team up to fight crime as vigilantes in this riveting thriller.

programme.title: Thor: The Dark World
programme.desc: In this thrilling fantasy sequel, Thor must team up with his mischievous brother Loki in order to defeat a Dark Elf who's plotting to destroy all of existence. Meanwhile, his true love Jane Foster is possessed by a cosmic force.

programme.title: Jumanji: Welcome to the Jungle
programme.desc: Four teenagers discover a mysterious video game from the '90s while serving detention. When they try to play it, they are transformed into various video-game avatars and dropped into a virtual jungle world in this wild fantasy adventure.

programme.title: Paul Blart: Mall Cop 2
programme.desc: In this farcical sequel, accomplished mall security guard Paul Blart discovers a heist plot while attending an expo in Las Vegas. His investigative prowess is needed to foil the robbery and arrest those responsible.

programme.title: Step Up
programme.desc: It's a battle for control over High Water and dreams of power, fame and fortune. Many secrets are revealed including the real murderer of East-O and the true identity of Saint Clip.

programme.title: Venom: Let There be Carnage
programme.desc: An isolated Eddie Brock strives to live alongside the creature Venom. Yet their tenuous sense of peace descends into chaos when the psychologists at Ravencroft begin experimenting upon Cletus Kasady, unleashing a creature that Eddie knows only he and Venom are strong enough to face in battle.

programme.title: Lakeview Terrace
programme.desc: A young couple who move into their dream home are terrorized by their next-door neighbor, a black LAPD officer who disapproves of their interracial relationship. Samuel L. Jackson, Patrick Wilson and Kerry Washington star in this taut thriller. Ron Glass, Justin Chambers. Directed by Neil Labute.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement
programme.desc: This taut William Friedkin thriller features powerhouse performances by Tommy Lee Jones and Samuel L. Jackson. Jackson plays a Marine colonel on trial for a mission that went horribly wrong; Jones is his lawyer, a friend who doubts his innocence. Ben Kingsley,Guy Pearce, Bruce Greenwood.

programme.title: Phone Booth
programme.desc: Following Stuart Shepard, a New York publicist who, after using a pay phone to call his mistress, finds himself on the wrong end of a terrifying call.

programme.title: Love & Mercy
programme.desc: This wonderfully unconventional biopic of Beach Boy composer Brian Wilson focuses on two seminal periods in his life: his creative triumphs and mental breakdown as a young man, and his struggles in middle age to wrench free from a domineering therapist.

programme.title: Sweeney Todd: The Demon Barber of Fleet Street
programme.desc: Best Actor Oscar nominee Johnny Depp perfectly embodies the title role in Tim Burton's bloody well-done adaptation of the Stephen Sondheim musical about the vengeful owner of a tonsorial parlor that offers customers more than just a shave and a haircut. Helena Bonham Carter costars as Mrs. Lovett, who makes a killing with her new pie recipe containing a special meaty ingredient.

programme.title: Total Recall
programme.desc: A 21st-century construction worker discovers that his entire memory of the past derives from a chip implanted in his brain.

programme.title: Smokin' Aces
programme.desc: This explosive, energetic crime opus, set in a glitzy Lake Tahoe hotel, rides shotgun with a wild collection of assassins as they gun for lowlife magician Buddy "Aces" Israel (Jeremy Piven), who is turning state's evidence against the mob. Ben Affleck, Ray Liotta, Ryan Reynolds, Taraji Henson, Andy Garcia, Peter Berg. Wayne Newton has a cameo as himself. Singer Alicia Keys and rapper Common make their big-screen debuts. Written and directed by Joe Carnahan.

programme.title: Alfie
programme.desc: Jude Law defines charisma in this funny, insightful and sometimes poignant portrait of an unabashed philanderer. Law plays Alfie, a Manhattan chauffeur who begins to reevaluate his shallow ideas about women and romance. The comedy-drama is a remake of the 1966 Michael Caine film of the same name. Marisa Tomei, Susan Sarandon, Jane Krakowski, Nia Long, Omar Epps.

programme.title: What Happens in Vegas
programme.desc: A charming Cameron Diaz stars as an uptight stock trader who meets and marries immature slacker Ashton Kutcher one drunken night in Las Vegas. They agree to an annulment---until he wins a $3 million jackpot with her quarter. Ordered by a judge to live for six months as husband and wife before either can claim the prize, they're bound to fall in love---if they don't kill each other first. Lake Bell

programme.title: The Animal
programme.desc: Rob Schneider is hilarious in this comedy about Marvin Mange, an aspiring cop who undergoes "transspecies" surgery after a car accident. When he recovers, Mange has the physical prowess of a beast and must work feverishly to control his animal instincts if he is to win the heart of a perky environmental activist (Colleen Haskell). John C. McGinley, Edward Asner, Adam Sandler.

programme.title: Next Day Air
programme.desc: A drug shipment is sent to the wrong address, prompting a frantic race to recover the package before its contents are revealed in this hilarious crime comedy. Brody (Mike Epps) and Guch have mistakenly received a package containing 10 kilos of cocaine. If they can just find a buyer, they'll be rich. Meanwhile, intended recipients Jesus and Chita try to track down the shipment before drug lord Bodego Diablo realizes it's missing. But Bodega already knows the score and he wants his drugs.

programme.title: Cobra
programme.desc: An elite cop protects a witness from a murderous cult.

programme.title: The Forgotten
programme.desc: Julianne Moore ("The Hours") and Gary Sinise ("CSI: New York") star in a riveting thriller you'll never forget. Moore plays a mother who's grieving over the loss of her son when she's told the child never existed. Dominic West, Anthony Edwards, Alfre Woodard.

programme.title: Beautiful Creatures
programme.desc: This epic romantic fantasy tells the story of Ethan, a young man who falls for Lena, a new girl in his small town, only to discover she comes from a mysterious family, all of whom all possess supernatural powers. Together, they team up to break a curse that casts Lena's entire future in doubt.

programme.title: Collide
programme.desc: After a robbery goes awry, a young man must call on his drug-smuggling former boss to protect his girlfriend from mobsters who want to kill both of them and retrieve their cargo.

programme.title: The Forever Purge
programme.desc: An unorthodox society partakes in a twelve-hour period of legalized crime once every year, allowing the citizens' wildest and darkest fantasies to come to light. However, things quickly descend into chaos as the crimes escalate in violence and the death toll continues to rise in this final installment of "The Purge" franchise.

programme.title: Next
programme.desc: Nicolas Cage stars in this explosive action thriller about a Las Vegas magician who's enlisted by an FBI agent (Julianne Moore) to help prevent a terrorist attack because he can see two minutes into the future. Jessica Biel, Thomas Kretschmann, Tory Kittles. Directed by Lee Tamahori.

programme.title: The Bourne Identity
programme.desc: Matt Damon stars in this well-executed adaptation of Robert Ludlum's bestselling thriller. The story centers on an amnesiac CIA assassin who embarks on a desperate race to save his own life after he is deemed expendable by his superiors. Franka Potente, Chris Cooper, Clive Owen, Brian Cox, Adewale Akinnouye-Agbaje, Julia Stiles.

programme.title: The Bourne Supremacy
programme.desc: In this rip-roaring sequel, amnesiac Jason Bourne is framed for a CIA operation gone wrong. Bourne is then cornered into using his accomplished assassin techniques to fight for survival and clear his name.

programme.title: 10,000 B.C.
programme.desc: Fun prehistoric adventure about a tribe of mammoth hunters. When they're raided by marauders who kidnap survivors to serve as slaves, brave D'Leh leads a rescue party across perilous terrain fraught with saber-toothed tigers and killer dodos.

programme.title: Valkyrie
programme.desc: Tom Cruise stars in the incredible true story of a rebel German army officer who led a plot to assassinate Adolf Hitler and overthrow his ruthless Nazi regime during World War II. Bryan Singer ("X-Men") directs this suspenseful thriller. Kenneth Branagh, Bill Nighy, Tom Wilkinson.

programme.title: My Days of Mercy
programme.desc: While attending her father's trial, a woman named Lucy crosses paths with Mercy, a lawyer, and the two begin a cautious relationship. Tension between the two develops as Lucy staunchly opposes the death penalty while Mercy is in favor of it. A drama is set against the backdrop of Lucy's father's death row sentence for the murder of his wife.

programme.title: Marked for Death
programme.desc: A retired DEA agent takes down a Jamaican drug gang that has overrun his hometown.

programme.title: Rain Man
programme.desc: A self-centered man learns he has an autistic older brother he never knew about after their father dies and leaves the older brother the bulk of his multi-million dollar estate. The younger brother takes his institutionalized sibling on a road trip hoping to get some of the money for himself, but soon the two make a genuine connection.

programme.title: Girl with a Pearl Earring
programme.desc: Colin Firth and Scarlett Johansson star in this absorbing, visually rich drama set in the Netherlands during the 1660s. Firth plays painter Johannes Vermeer; Johansson is a maid who becomes his model and the subject of one of his most famous creations. The film scored three Oscar nominations. Tom Wilkinson.

programme.title: Voyagers
programme.desc: Sela and Christopher are part of a 30-person space odyssey that takes place sometime in the near future. The mission includes people from various generations sent out to scope the universe for a possible new home for humans. However, being inside a ship takes its toll on the people inside it, as panic and paranoia take over, unraveling them back to their primal state.

programme.desc: Killer and shark-obsessive Bruce Kane is in hiding, masquerading as a shark researcher in the isolated lighthouse where high school student Courtney and her friends have decided to go swimming. programme.desc: Minister Leslie Reynolds makes it a point to be welcoming and helpful to everyone in her congregation. This becomes much more difficult however when she meets Gareth and Emma. programme.desc: A single mom becomes involved with a married preacher whose heiress wife is soon murdered.

programme.desc: Brutal murders in an Amish community are investigated by its female chief of police, who also witnessed horrific crimes there when she was a child.

programme.title: Escaping the NXIVM Cult: A Mother's Fight to Save Her Daughter
programme.desc: The story of Catherine Oxenberg and her fight to save her daughter India from a dangerous sex cult.
