programme.desc: When Heather discovers her teenage daughter, Ally, is missing, she immediately goes to the police. The police find Ally's belongings by a river and presume she has drowned. Determined to prove her daughter is alive, Heather begins going through Ally's possessions and uncovers Ally's odd friendship with a group of troubled teens at a nearby youth center led by a man named Bridger.

programme.title: 3 Godfathers
programme.desc: Three bandits on the run in the Arizona desert discover a dying woman and her baby, and promise the mother they'll see that the infant makes it to civilization.

programme.title: Christmas in Connecticut
programme.desc: The columnist for a national housekeeping magazine, as part of a promotional stunt, welcomes a returning war hero into her country estate, the only problem is she's a klutz in the kitchen, where she's never been at home on the range.

programme.title: Holiday Affair
programme.desc: A department-store clerk meets a war widow who's shopping at Christmastime and romance ensues, much to the displeasure of her stuffed-shirt attorney boyfriend.

programme.title: Little Women
programme.desc: Adaptation of Louisa May Alcott's classic slice of Americana about the four spirited March sisters and details their adventures, ambitions and romances in 1860s Massachusetts.

programme.title: Auntie Mame
programme.desc: Best Picture nominee is about a young impressionable orphan who receives a dizzyingly wild upbringing from his eccentric madcap aunt who detests nonsense in others but loves it in herself. The script is based on Patrick Dennis' autobiographical novel that also spawned a Broadway hit and was made into a movie musical in 1974.

programme.title: Beyond Tomorrow
programme.desc: The spirits of three dead bachelors killed in an airplane crash try to help a couple find happiness after setting the pair up while they were still alive.

programme.title: Blossoms in the Dust
programme.desc: A woman devotes her life to helping care for illegitimate children and finding them loving homes after her own child dies at a young age. She eventually becomes a significant political figure who erases the stigma of illegitimacy by changing the information required on birth certificates.

programme.title: The Curse of the Cat People
programme.desc: The father of a 6-year-old girl with a vivid imagination and an inability to get along with other children fears that she may be exhibiting the tendencies of his late wife, who believed she was a catwoman.

programme.title: The Thin Man
programme.desc: First and best of the famous whodunit series has the wisecracking, martini-sipping husband-and-wife sleuthing team of Nick and Nora Charles investigating the disappearance of an inventor who later is implicated in the murder of his secretary. The film, an adaptation of a Dashiell Hammett private-eye classic, was followed by five sequels. Incidentally, "The Thin Man" refers to the inventor, not Nick Charles.

programme.title: Susan Slept Here
programme.desc: A Hollywood screenwriter working on a script about juvenile delinquents takes in a female teenage troublemaker to help with his research, and has to deal with a fiancée who thinks that the relationship is more than platonic. The film's opening narration is provided by an Oscar statuette. This was actor-singer Dick Powell's final big-screen appearance.

programme.title: Never Say Goodbye
programme.desc: An artist tries to reconcile with his divorced wife

programme.title: Bachelor Mother
programme.desc: When a man mistakes a pretty, fun-loving department-store clerk for the mother of a foundling baby, he becomes determined to keep mom and child together, much to her dismay.

programme.title: Ma and Pa Kettle at Home
programme.desc: The Kettles play host to a fussy contest judge to help their son win a college scholarship.

programme.title: The Lion in Winter
programme.desc: Sumptuous adaptation of the play about royal-family intrigue in 1183 involving King Henry II, his estranged wife Eleanor of Aquitaine and their three sons who make up the line of succession.

programme.title: It Happened on Fifth Avenue
programme.desc: A vagabond moves into a New York City mansion while the owner is wintering down South and opens the doors to a number of unfortunates, including the vacationer's daughter, whom the squatter mistakes for a down-on-her-luck runaway from an abusive father.

programme.title: The Man Who Came to Dinner
programme.desc: An adaptation of the Broadway hit about an imperious, acid-tongued lecturer who, after being injured in a fall in front of an Ohio family's abode, becomes their surprise houseguest while he recovers, and proceeds to drive them crazy.

programme.title: Fitzwilly
programme.desc: Dick Van Dyke as a butler who organizes his fellow servants into a gang of thieves to keep their mistress (Edith Evans) out of poverty. Barbara Feldon, John McGiver, Harry Townes. Dunne: John Fiedler. Oderblatz: Norman Fell. Buckmaster: Cecil Kellaway. Grimsby: Anne Seymour. Oliver: Sam Waterston. Directed by Delbert Mann.

programme.title: Lady on a Train
programme.desc: While staring out a train window as she approaches New York City's Grand Central station, a young woman witnesses a murder being committed in a nearby office building, but nobody believes her, so she enlists the aid of a mystery writer and investigates the crime herself.

programme.title: The Silent Partner
programme.desc: Clever account of a Toronto bank robbery. Elliott Gould, Christopher Plummer, Susannah York. Elaine: Celine Lomez. Willard: Ken Pogue. Packard: Michael Kirby. Bank Guard: Sean Sullivan. Daryl Duke directed.

programme.title: Bundle of Joy
programme.desc: Musical remake of the 1939 comedy "Bachelor Mother" is about a department-store salesgirl whose life is turned upside-down when she finds an abandoned infant, and despite her protestations and denials, many assume she's the child's actual mother. Stars Eddie Fisher and Debbie Reynolds were married at the time.

programme.title: The Daughter of Rosie O'Grady
programme.desc: A turn-of-the-century lass disobeys her father's wishes when she pursues fame as a vaudeville star and falls in love with a fellow performer.

programme.title: On Moonlight Bay
programme.desc: Booth Tarkington characters come to life in this nostalgic charmer about a young man (Gordon MacRae) romancing a banker's daughter (Doris Day) in early 20th-century Indiana. The score features standards such as "Till We Meet Again," "I'm Forever Blowing Bubbles," "Cuddle Up a Little Closer" and the title song. Followed by the 1953 sequel "By the Light of the Silvery Moon."

programme.title: Our Vines Have Tender Grapes
programme.desc: A Norwegian father endeavors to raise his daughter with love and learning in a Wisconsin farming community during World War II.

programme.title: All Mine to Give
programme.desc: After her husband dies, an immigrant wife takes on the responsibility of raising their six children on the Wisconsin frontier, circa 1865, but when she takes ill and passes on, it falls to her young son to find homes for his siblings.

programme.title: Penny Serenade
programme.desc: Sentimental journey taken through the years with a married couple who experience a lifetime of heartbreaking trials and tribulations but also a number of times of unexpected joy and triumph. Cary Grant received a Best Actor nomination as the husband.

programme.title: Once Upon a Time in Hollywood
programme.desc: In 1960s Los Angeles, silver screen actor Rick Dalton and his stunt double turned best friend, Cliff Booth, struggle to keep pace with the swiftly evolving entertainment industry. They both work to continue their notoriety while facing the demise of Hollywood's Golden Age.

programme.title: The Prize Winner of Defiance, Ohio
programme.desc: A 1950s housewife with 10 kids and an alcoholic husband keeps her family afloat by winning prize money in jingle and slogan-writing contests. Julianne Moore shines in this warm and affectionate true story. Woody Harrelson, Laura Dern. Jane Anderson directed and wrote the film.

programme.title: American Chaos
programme.desc: An examination of the furver behind behind President Trump looks back on his 2016 Presidential campaign and spotlights those who supported him during that time, and if they feel he is living up to the promises he made when he was running for President.

programme.title: Stay
programme.desc: Director Marc Forster's follow-up to the fanciful "Finding Neverland" is this stylish and intricately plotted psychological thriller about a psychiatrist (Ewan McGregor) and his mad dash to save a suicidal young patient (Ryan Gosling) who is planning to celebrate his 21st birthday by killing himself. Written by David Benioff, who created the screenplays for "25th Hour" and "Troy."

programme.title: I'm Charlie Walker
programme.desc: In the early 1970s, a man must deal with a racist Bay Area corporation as he cleans up a massive oil spill. Charlie Walker, a black contractor who had trouble finding work, takes it upon himself to break the mold and make a name for himself. Based on a true story.

programme.title: Nine Days
programme.desc: At a waystation in a remote desert, Will, an arbiter, interviews prospective souls for rebirth. Yet the sudden death of a treasured soul upends Will's fragile, unusual existence. Amidst his grief, Will must confront his own arrested potential with the help of the empathetic Emma to achieve catharsis.

programme.title: Parallel Mothers
programme.desc: In a maternity ward, two women of disparate backgrounds find their lives entwining in an unexpected way. Middle-aged Janis eagerly awaits her new arrival as Ana, a traumatized teen, fears what the future may hold for her and her new child. As the women navigate the trials of childbirth and the impending expectations of motherhood, they develop an intricate, complex bond that irrevocably alters the course of their lives.

programme.title: The Happy Prince
programme.desc: This historical biopic chronicles the last three years in the life of writer Oscar Wilde, during which he traveled across Europe after serving time in prison for his relationships with other men. Along the way, Wilde gets caught up in a love triangle with his literary executor and a petulant young man.

programme.title: Heart of Champions
programme.desc: In 1999, a close-knit team of rowers at an Ivy League institution experiences a renewed sense of hope with their new coach, an ex-soldier. As the young men navigate the highs and lows of their rowing season, they learn the true value of brotherhood in the face of overwhelming adversity.

programme.title: In Her Shoes
programme.desc: Toni Collette and Cameron Diaz shine as a pair of mismatched sisters in this touching character study. Collette is the sensible, driven one, and Diaz is an irresponsible, self-centered party girl who may have stepped on her sibling's toes once too often. Shirley MacLaine is excellent as their grandmother, a Florida retiree whom the women thought was dead. Directed by Curtis Hanson. Mark Feuerstein, Ken Howard, Candice Azzara, Norman Lloyd, Francine Beers.

programme.title: Summertime
programme.desc: This loosely structured dramedy follows the intersecting lives of 25 young Angelinos as they go about Los Angeles on a single hot summer day. A fast-food worker, a roller skating guitarist, and two aspiring rappers turn to creative self-expression to give voice to their hopes, traumas, joys, and agonies.

programme.title: Parallel Mothers
programme.desc: In a maternity ward, two women of disparate backgrounds find their lives entwining in an unexpected way. Middle-aged Janis eagerly awaits her new arrival as Ana, a traumatized teen, fears what the future may hold for her and her new child. As the women navigate the trials of childbirth and the impending expectations of motherhood, they develop an intricate, complex bond that irrevocably alters the course of their lives.

programme.title: Nine Days
programme.desc: At a waystation in a remote desert, Will, an arbiter, interviews prospective souls for rebirth. Yet the sudden death of a treasured soul upends Will's fragile, unusual existence. Amidst his grief, Will must confront his own arrested potential with the help of the empathetic Emma to achieve catharsis.

programme.title: Dangerous Liaisons
programme.desc: Camille and Valmont are caught in a dangerous situation after working on a new plan to face their past ghosts.

programme.title: Wild Indian
programme.desc: This thriller follows the lives of Michael and his cousin Ted-O decades after they took part in the murder and cover-up of a classmate. Michael has reinvented himself whilst Ted-O is fresh out of jail. But Ted-O wants to clear his conscience and Michael cannot afford the truth to be known.

programme.title: Summertime
programme.desc: This loosely structured dramedy follows the intersecting lives of 25 young Angelinos as they go about Los Angeles on a single hot summer day. A fast-food worker, a roller skating guitarist, and two aspiring rappers turn to creative self-expression to give voice to their hopes, traumas, joys, and agonies.

programme.title: Dangerous Liaisons
programme.desc: Camille and Valmont are caught in a dangerous situation after working on a new plan to face their past ghosts.

programme.title: Measure of Revenge
programme.desc: Measure of Revenge tells the story of theater actress Lillian Cooper, whose son dies mysteriously. When the death is ruled an accidental overdose, Lillian decides to investigate on her own, allying with her son's drug dealer, Taz. This investigation immerses her in her rock star son's underground world. Along the way, she hallucinates many of the iconic characters she has portrayed, all of whom encourage her to solve the mystery and seek vengeance.

programme.title: In Her Shoes
programme.desc: Toni Collette and Cameron Diaz shine as a pair of mismatched sisters in this touching character study. Collette is the sensible, driven one, and Diaz is an irresponsible, self-centered party girl who may have stepped on her sibling's toes once too often. Shirley MacLaine is excellent as their grandmother, a Florida retiree whom the women thought was dead. Directed by Curtis Hanson. Mark Feuerstein, Ken Howard, Candice Azzara, Norman Lloyd, Francine Beers.

programme.title: Dangerous Liaisons
programme.desc: Camille and Valmont are caught in a dangerous situation after working on a new plan to face their past ghosts.

programme.title: Good
programme.desc: Payton aspires to climb the social ladder of his community by marrying into an affluent family. When hired as a caretaker to the elderly and well-off Gregory, Payton believes he has finally found the path to achieving his aspirations. Yet as the unlikely duo grows closer and Gregory divulges the secrets of his turbulent past, Payton is inspired to confront his own issues in the pregnant ex-girlfriend he abandoned in his quest for riches.

programme.title: Queen of the Capital
programme.desc: This vivacious documentary follows Muffy Blake Stephyns, a drag performer with high aspirations. Muffy and her everyday persona, Daniel, navigate the drag and bureaucratic worlds of Washington, D.C., while following her dream to lead a colorful group of philanthropic drag performers. Using skills from a former life as a campaign consultant, she runs for Empress of the Imperial Court of D.C.

programme.title: Snow Flower and the Secret Fan
programme.desc: Bingbing Li and Gianna Jun star in this touching drama about the friendship between two young girls living in 19th-century China, who communicate with each other by trading messages hidden inside a folding fan. Later, the girls' descendants struggle to maintain their friendship while dealing with the complications of life in 21st-century Shanghai.

programme.title: Pretty Bird
programme.desc: Three entrepreneurs chase a dream to revolutionize personal travel by creating a jet-propelled "rocket belt," but personality clashes, mistrust and delusions of grandeur threaten to torpedo their million-dollar idea. Nominated for a Grand Jury Prize at the Sundance Film Festival.

programme.title: Runaway Jury
programme.desc: In this suspenseful, well-plotted and beautifully acted legal thriller, an attorney who's brought a wrongful-death lawsuit against a gun manufacturer, a jury consultant working for the company, and a member of the jury cross paths. The film is based on a John Grisham bestseller.

programme.title: Emma
programme.desc: A spoiled, clever English society woman plays matchmaker to everyone she knows in this adaptation of the 1816 Jane Austen novel. Gwyneth Paltrow, Jeremy Northam, Toni Collette, Greta Scacchi.

programme.title: The Red Turtle
programme.desc: A man is shipwrecked on an island inhabited by majestic animals, where he soon establishes a family and a new life. This rapturous animated tale is told entirely without dialogue.

programme.title: Snow Flower and the Secret Fan
programme.desc: Bingbing Li and Gianna Jun star in this touching drama about the friendship between two young girls living in 19th-century China, who communicate with each other by trading messages hidden inside a folding fan. Later, the girls' descendants struggle to maintain their friendship while dealing with the complications of life in 21st-century Shanghai.

programme.title: Measure of Revenge
programme.desc: Measure of Revenge tells the story of theater actress Lillian Cooper, whose son dies mysteriously. When the death is ruled an accidental overdose, Lillian decides to investigate on her own, allying with her son's drug dealer, Taz. This investigation immerses her in her rock star son's underground world. Along the way, she hallucinates many of the iconic characters she has portrayed, all of whom encourage her to solve the mystery and seek vengeance.

programme.title: 12 Years a Slave
programme.desc: The harrowing true story of Solomon Northup, a free black man in 1800s New York who was kidnapped and forced into slavery on a plantation near New Orleans. Later, he fights for his freedom with the help of a Canadian abolitionist.

programme.title: The Accidental Spy
programme.desc: It specialist Emmanuel takes a trip to the U.S. in a bid to get over a failed relationship. He becomes entwined in a reality TV mix up with a notorious gang.

programme.title: Team America: World Police
programme.desc: "South Park" creators Trey Parker and Matt Stone supply most of the voices for an all-puppet cast in this uproariously profane, razor-sharp satire. The film tracks a blindly patriotic cop squad on their quest to stamp out global tyranny and terrorism. Other voice talent includes Kristen Miller, Daran Norris, Maurice LaMarche and Masasa.

programme.title: Miami Vice
programme.desc: Miami detectives Crockett and Tubbs go undercover to break up a Colombian drug cartel in this stylish and exciting update of the trendy 1980s cop series.

programme.title: Unlocked
programme.desc: A traumatized CIA agent must prevent terrorists from unleashing a biological attack on London. When she is forced to go on the run after being betrayed, she teams up with an ex-soldier to complete her mission.

programme.title: Mindhunters
programme.desc: Renny Harlin directed this suspenseful thriller about a group of FBI trainees who've gathered to study profiling techniques, only to soon discover that there is a killer among them. Val Kilmer, Christian Slater, LL Cool J, Jonny Lee Miller, Kathryn Morris, Patricia Velasquez.

programme.title: Revolver
programme.desc: After seven years inside, a conman is determined to take revenge on a mob boss.

programme.title: Bend It Like Beckham
programme.desc: You don't have to be a soccer fan to get a kick out of this delightful coming-of-age comedy. It's the story of an English teen (Parminder K. Nagra) whose dreams of athletic stardom clash with the wishes of her traditional Sikh family. The title refers to British soccer phenom David Beckham. Gurinder Chadha directed. Keira Knightley, Jonathan Rhys-Meyers, Anupam Kher, Alan Paxton, Juliet Stevenson, Shaheen Khan, Ameet Chana.

programme.title: I Origins
programme.desc: In this philosophical sci-fi drama, a biologist who specializes in the human eye makes a discovery that has profound implications for his understanding of mankind.

programme.title: Casa de mi Padre
programme.desc: A rancher named Armando attempts to settle his late father's debts, and in the process he clashes with a ruthless Mexican drug lord in this riotous Will Ferrell comedy. Meanwhile, Armando deals with his attraction to his brother's fiancée.

programme.title: An American Haunting
programme.desc: Donald Sutherland and Sissy Spacek star in this chilling ghost story based on the documented case of a family in early 19th-century rural Tennessee that is haunted by an evil spirit. James D'Arcy, Rachel Hurd-Wood. Directed by Courtney Solomon.

programme.title: Master Of The Drunken Fist: Beggar So
programme.desc: Due to a conspiracy, wealthy So Chan loses everything. Saved by the Beggars' Sect, he learns the long lost martial art Drunken Fist to defeat the person who framed him.

programme.title: Sleeping With the Enemy
programme.desc: A battered wife is stalked by her abusive husband after faking her death to start a new life.

programme.title: The Secret Life of Walter Mitty
programme.desc: In this fantastical, poignant comedy, a man who spends much of his time lost in elaborate daydreams goes on an adventure around the world in order to retrieve a photo negative that the magazine he works for needs.

programme.title: Smokin' Aces
programme.desc: This explosive, energetic crime opus, set in a glitzy Lake Tahoe hotel, rides shotgun with a wild collection of assassins as they gun for lowlife magician Buddy "Aces" Israel (Jeremy Piven), who is turning state's evidence against the mob. Ben Affleck, Ray Liotta, Ryan Reynolds, Taraji Henson, Andy Garcia, Peter Berg. Wayne Newton has a cameo as himself. Singer Alicia Keys and rapper Common make their big-screen debuts. Written and directed by Joe Carnahan.

programme.title: The One
programme.desc: Jet Li plays multiple roles in this sci-fi actioner. In a cosmos with 125 parallel universes, a killer (Li) skips between dimensions to murder other versions of himself. But he finds a formidable foe in the last remaining version---a kindly L.A. cop (also Li) with a really mean kick. Carla Gugino, Delroy Lindo. Directed by James Wong.

programme.title: The Raid: Redemption
programme.desc: Deep in the heart of Jakarta's slums lies an impenetrable safe house for the world's most dangerous killers and gangsters. Until now, the run-down apartment block has been considered untouchable to even the bravest of police. Cloaked under the cover of pre-dawn darkness and silence, an elite swat team is tasked with raiding the safe house in order to take down the notorious drug lord that runs it.

programme.title: Halloween Kills
programme.desc: Laurie Strode comes out triumphant in her showdown with Michael Myers after she leaves him burning in a cage in her basement. Though badly injured, she begins to feel a sense of relief, thinking she has finally gotten rid of her lifelong tormentor. When the bloodbath resumes, she is alerted that the evil serial killer has survived and that once again, she has to gear up to take him on. This time, however, Haddonfield rallies behind her, intent on eliminating Michael once and for all.

programme.title: No Way Out
programme.desc: A Naval Officer who slept with the US Secretary of Defense's mistress is tasked with rooting the KGB mole accused of murdering her, but realizes that he has become a pawn in an elaborate cover up to protect the murderous politician.

programme.title: Total Recall
programme.desc: A 21st-century construction worker discovers that his entire memory of the past derives from a chip implanted in his brain.

programme.title: Disturbing Behavior
programme.desc: Katie Holmes and James Marsden star in this chiller as high-school misfits who suspect something's amiss about their seemingly perfect classmates. As they delve into the mystery, they fear they'll be the next unwilling members of the sinister club of vicious conformists.

programme.title: Life of Pi
programme.desc: In this visually stunning adventure drama, a zookeeper's son is stranded at sea aboard a lifeboat with a zebra, an orangutan, a hyena and a Bengal tiger named Richard Parker.

programme.title: Lucky You
programme.desc: Drew Barrymore and Eric Bana are aces in this winning comedy-romance set in and around Las Vegas casinos. She's an aspiring lounge singer who falls for a poker-playing stud (Bana) who lives fast, plays hard and has a tendency to win big and lose bigger. Robert Duvall costars as Bana's cardsharp-legend dad. Debra Messing, Jean Smart. Directed by Curtis Hanson, who cowrote the script with Eric Roth. Features cameos by real-life poker superstars Daniel Negreanu, Sammy Farha and Phil Hellmuth.

programme.title: Burn After Reading
programme.desc: Two hapless gym employees find a computer disc containing a CIA agent's company secrets and decide to blackmail him to pay for plastic surgery.

programme.title: Phone Booth
programme.desc: Irishman Colin Farrell plays an egotistical, Bronx-born publicist who's held hostage in a public telephone booth at a busy New York City intersection. His captor: a menacing, self-righteous sniper (Kiefer Sutherland). This taut and entertaining thriller is a briskly paced morality play from director Joel Schumacher. Forest Whitaker, Katie Holmes, Radha Mitchell.

programme.title: A Bridge Too Far
programme.desc: Allied military leaders concoct an elaborate plan to capture a Nazi-held bridge in Holland. Their ambitions get them into serious trouble when they discover there are far more enemy troops stationed there than they had imagined.

programme.title: The Forever Purge
programme.desc: An unorthodox society partakes in a twelve-hour period of legalized crime once every year, allowing the citizens' wildest and darkest fantasies to come to light. However, things quickly descend into chaos as the crimes escalate in violence and the death toll continues to rise in this final installment of "The Purge" franchise.

programme.title: Memento
programme.desc: A man with short-term memory loss tries to avenge a brutal crime in this mesmerizing and inventive drama, which unfolds in reverse chronological order.

programme.title: Dances With Wolves
programme.desc: A suicidal former Union soldier ends up joining a Sioux tribe. He then takes up arms to defend them when the Army attacks.

programme.title: Burn After Reading
programme.desc: Two hapless gym employees find a computer disc containing a CIA agent's company secrets and decide to blackmail him to pay for plastic surgery.

programme.title: Dude, Where's My Car?
programme.desc: Two slackers have an excellent adventure in this riotous comedy. After a wild night they don't remember, dimwits Jesse (Ashton Kutcher) and Chester (Seann William Scott) search valiantly for Jesse's missing car. Along the way, they encounter a money-hungry transsexual stripper, a spacy group of extraterrestrial loonies and killer ostriches. Kristy Swanson, Hal Sparks.

programme.title: The Heartbreak Kid
programme.desc: After a honeymooning newlywed (Ben Stiller) realizes he's involved in a nightmarish marriage, he meets the woman of his dreams (Michelle Monaghan). Hilarious remake of the 1972 hit film that starred Charles Grodin and Cybill Shepherd. Stiller's father Jerry Stiller costars as Doc. Directed by Bobby and Peter Farrelly, who co-wrote the script with Kevin Barnett, Leslie Dixon and Scot Armstrong.

programme.title: Another Me
programme.desc: In this heart pounding thriller, a young woman suspects that she's being quietly hunted by her own "double," who is slowly taking over her identity and might be planning to take her life.

programme.title: Bulworth
programme.desc: Writer-director-star Warren Beatty is a revelation as Jay Bulworth, a senator who's disenchanted with the political system and decides to speak the truth to his constituents---using rap. Halle Berry, Oliver Platt, Christine Baranski, Don Cheadle.

programme.title: Mystic Pizza
programme.desc: Three young women come of age amid romantic entanglements while working at a Connecticut pizzeria shortly after graduating from high school.

programme.title: Dolapo Is Fine
programme.desc: A story about a young Black girl's relationship with her hair and name, and how it helps her understand who she really is.

programme.title: Man of the Year
programme.desc: This hilarious political satire asks the question: What would happen if one of the country's funniest men became its most powerful? Robin Williams stars as a comedian who runs for president on a lark—and wins.

programme.title: The Purge: Anarchy
programme.desc: In this edge-of-your-seat sequel, a young couple must fight to survive after their car breaks down in the city during a night when all crime is legal.

programme.title: Fighting
programme.desc: Channing Tatum stars as a small-town kid inducted into the violent world of bare-knuckle boxing in this tense and gritty urban drama. Arriving in New York City with nothing but the shirt on his back, Shawn MacArthur earns a living by selling counterfeit goods on the street. Later, he crosses paths with crafty con artist Harvey Boarden, who offers to help the uneasy newcomer make some cash on the bare-knuckle circuit. Shawn quickly makes a name for himself by taking down every opponent he faces.

programme.title: Sleuth
programme.desc: Fresh and rewarding remake of the Broadway hit involving deadly cat-and-mouse games between a wickedly clever writer (Michael Caine) and his wife's lover (Jude Law), an actor whom he surprises with a most unusual moneymaking proposition. Caine played the lothario role in the 1972 original. Directed by Kenneth Branagh, co-produced with Law. Playwright Harold Pinter rewrote the script based on Anthony Shaffer's play. Law also played the Michael Caine title role in the 2004 remake of "Alfie."

programme.title: The Benchwarmers
programme.desc: Hilarious underdog comedy about a trio of nerdy grown-ups with minimal athletic ability who form a three-man baseball team to challenge bullying Little Leaguers.

programme.title: The Break-Up
programme.desc: Sidesplitting battle-of-the-sexes romp about an estranged couple uncomfortably sharing their condo.

programme.title: What Happens in Vegas
programme.desc: A charming Cameron Diaz stars as an uptight stock trader who meets and marries immature slacker Ashton Kutcher one drunken night in Las Vegas. They agree to an annulment---until he wins a $3 million jackpot with her quarter. Ordered by a judge to live for six months as husband and wife before either can claim the prize, they're bound to fall in love---if they don't kill each other first. Lake Bell

programme.title: 3:10 to Yuma
programme.desc: Gripping and ripping remake of the 1957 Western about a small-time rancher (Christian Bale) escorting a murderous outlaw (Russell Crowe) to a rendezvous with the law and a train that will take him to prison. Meanwhile, the desperado's henchmen try to head them off and free their leader, because without him they're "like a pack of dogs without a master." Directed by James Mangold, from a 1953 short story by Elmore Leonard. Ben Foster, Gretchen Mol, Dallas Roberts, Alan Tudyk, Peter Fonda.

programme.title: Narc
programme.desc: Two disturbed detectives join forces to investigate an undercover cop's murder. As they develop mutual respect for one another, unethical conduct reveals dark truths that could split them apart. Writer-director Joe Carnahan shot the film in 27 days, and spent the last 10 working on the climactic finale set in an actual chop shop.

programme.title: The Drop
programme.desc: In this pulse-pounding crime thriller, a man working in an illegal scheme funneling cash to the local organized-crime syndicate through "money drops" gets caught in the crossfire of a robbery gone wrong.

programme.title: Perfect Stranger
programme.desc: A reporter goes undercover to prove that a high-powered ad exec murdered her childhood friend. Halle Berry and Bruce Willis star in this suspenseful and twist-filled mystery. Giovanni Ribisi, Richard Portnow, Gary Dourdan, Florencia Lozano. Directed by James Foley.

programme.title: Iris
programme.desc: Kate Winslet and Judi Dench received Oscar nominations for their robust portrayals of novelist Iris Murdoch, whose eccentrically ebullient lifestyle degenerated into a losing battle with Alzheimer's disease. Jim Broadbent earned a Best Supporting Actor Oscar as her doting husband, John Bayley. Hugh Bonneville, Penelope Wilton.

programme.title: W.
programme.desc: Josh Brolin gives a pitch-perfect performance as President George W. Bush in Oliver Stone's provocative and semisatiric biopic tracing Bush's transformation from a privileged, partying frat boy to a born-again Christian and conservative politician. Elizabeth Banks, Ellen Burstyn, James Cromwell, Richard Dreyfuss.

programme.title: Absolute Power
programme.desc: This gripping thriller tells the story of a master thief who breaks into a D.C. mansion and witnesses a murder involving the President. As a result, the thief becomes a marked man. Resisting his instinct to flee, he decides to fight for justice.

programme.title: Mickey Blue Eyes
programme.desc: A British expat working in Manhattan as an auctioneer falls in love with a mobster's daughter in this hilarious comedy. When he tries to ingratiate himself with her family, he ends up involved in criminal activity and is forced to pose as a wiseguy from Kansas City.

programme.title: Last Night
programme.desc: While a man is away on a business trip, his wife (Keira Knightley) considers cheating on him with an old flame in this intimate drama. Meanwhile, he finds himself drawn to a sultry new coworker. Directed by Massy Tadjedin.

programme.title: Love & Mercy
programme.desc: This wonderfully unconventional biopic of Beach Boy composer Brian Wilson focuses on two seminal periods in his life: his creative triumphs and mental breakdown as a young man, and his struggles in middle age to wrench free from a domineering therapist.

programme.title: A Rodeo Film
programme.desc: A Black bull rider in rural California must choose between his brother and the woman he loves.

programme.title: Sweeney Todd: The Demon Barber of Fleet Street
programme.desc: Best Actor Oscar nominee Johnny Depp perfectly embodies the title role in Tim Burton's bloody well-done adaptation of the Stephen Sondheim musical about the vengeful owner of a tonsorial parlor that offers customers more than just a shave and a haircut. Helena Bonham Carter costars as Mrs. Lovett, who makes a killing with her new pie recipe containing a special meaty ingredient.

programme.title: This Is Where I Leave You
programme.desc: In this wry comedy, four adult siblings reunite for their father's funeral, along with a host of childhood friends, spouses past and present and their uncomfortably talkative mom.

programme.title: Mona Lisa Smile
programme.desc: Julia Roberts heads a strong ensemble cast in this moving drama about the power of individuality. Roberts plays a progressive 1950s Wellesley College art professor, who runs afoul of the faculty when she teaches her students to reach for the stars.

programme.title: Die Hard With a Vengeance
programme.desc: Cop John McClane teams with a shop owner to outwit a terrorist who is making him perform a series of dangerous tasks all around Manhattan.

programme.title: Deck the Halls
programme.desc: In this uproarious holiday farce, an uptight optometrist hits the roof when his neighbor decides to decorate his house with enough Christmas lights to be seen from space.

programme.title: Night at the Museum: Battle of the Smithsonian
programme.desc: Thrills, chills and laughter abound in this adventure comedy about late-night security guard who is put to the test after the exhibits in the Smithsonian come to life and begin wreaking havoc. Determined to save the museum from destruction, Larry takes on a loose T. rex, Attila the Hun and Roman gladiators eager to wage the epic battles of years gone by.

programme.title: A Beautiful Day in the Neighborhood
programme.desc: Lloyd Vogel is tasked with creating a profile of Fred Rogers, the creator and star of the successful children's program Mister Rogers' Neighborhood. He dutifully goes to the studio where his subject is filming his show, and soon enough, he is sitting down with him, asking him probing questions. However, Fred seems to have a different plan in mind. The interviewee suddenly becomes the interviewer, and he starts to help the writer sent for him in unexpected ways.

programme.title: Safe Haven
programme.desc: A reclusive woman starts a new life in a small North Carolina town, and reluctantly falls for a widowed father who helps her confront her troubled past in this affecting romantic drama.

programme.title: Dangerous Liaisons
programme.desc: Camille and Valmont are caught in a dangerous situation after working on a new plan to face their past ghosts.

programme.title: Christmas in Paradise
programme.desc: Three sisters locate their estranged father in a house in the Caribbean. As they enjoy the Christmas sunshine, they work to figure out why he ran away in the first place.

programme.title: Dangerous Liaisons
programme.desc: Camille and Valmont are caught in a dangerous situation after working on a new plan to face their past ghosts.

programme.title: The Unholy
programme.desc: This film based on the novel Shrine by James Herbert sees a journalist investigate the supernatural abilities of a young girl after an alleged visit from the Virgin Mary. Traveling to a small New England town, the journalist begins to uncover a more sinister truth surrounding the girl in this gothic horror film.

programme.title: Moulin Rouge
programme.desc: Nicole Kidman and Ewan McGregor star in this audacious and visually stunning musical romance. Kidman plays Satine, a courtesan and dance-hall performer at the famous Parisian nightclub; McGregor is Christian, the up-and-coming writer who loves her; and John Leguizamo adds superb support as Toulouse-Lautrec. Jim Broadbent, Richard Roxburgh, Kylie Minogue. Baz Luhrmann ("Strictly Ballroom") co-wrote and directed.

programme.title: A Journal for Jordan
programme.desc: In the early 2000s, Charles Monroe King, a sergeant, awaits deployment to Iraq to fight in the war. He is married to Dana, and they recently had a newborn son named Jordan. Dana gifts Charles a journal notebook so he can write to his son his musings and life lessons he wants to share.

programme.title: I'll Find You
programme.desc: Robert is a Catholic opera singer in a relationship with Jewish violinist Rachel. Together, they have dreams of performing at Carnegie Hall. But the German invasion of Poland during World War II separates them, potentially ending this hope. Robert vows that he will find Rachel, journeying into the heart of Nazi Germany and facing the potential tragedy of her being lost to him forever.

programme.title: Safe Haven
programme.desc: A reclusive woman starts a new life in a small North Carolina town, and reluctantly falls for a widowed father who helps her confront her troubled past in this affecting romantic drama.

programme.title: Dangerous Liaisons
programme.desc: Camille and Valmont are caught in a dangerous situation after working on a new plan to face their past ghosts.

programme.title: Rise of the Planet of the Apes
programme.desc: Created in a San Francisco lab by an ambitious father-and-son scientist team seeking to cure Alzheimer's disease, genetically engineered chimp Caesar (Andy Serkis) uses his powerful intellect to lead an ape uprising in this thrilling sci-fi prequel.

programme.title: A Journal for Jordan
programme.desc: In the early 2000s, Charles Monroe King, a sergeant, awaits deployment to Iraq to fight in the war. He is married to Dana, and they recently had a newborn son named Jordan. Dana gifts Charles a journal notebook so he can write to his son his musings and life lessons he wants to share.

programme.title: The Unholy
programme.desc: This film based on the novel Shrine by James Herbert sees a journalist investigate the supernatural abilities of a young girl after an alleged visit from the Virgin Mary. Traveling to a small New England town, the journalist begins to uncover a more sinister truth surrounding the girl in this gothic horror film.

programme.title: 22 Jump Street
programme.desc: Schmidt and Jenko go undercover on a college campus, posing as students to bust criminal activity amid the undergrads in this hilarious sequel to the hit comedy "21 Jump Street."

programme.title: Men in Black: International
programme.desc: A new team is protecting the earth from a special kind of shapeshifting alien in this sci-fi comedy adventure. But as two agents attempt to defend the earth against this alien threat, another enemy closer to home penetrates the organization in the form of a mole.

programme.title: Planet of the Apes
programme.desc: Director Tim Burton reimagines the 1968 sci-fi classic in this visually stunning feature set in 2029. Mark Wahlberg stars as an astronaut who crash-lands on a planet where dignified apes rule with an iron fist and subservient humans are treated like chattel. Helena Bonham Carter, Tim Roth, Michael Clarke Duncan, Paul Giamatti, Kris Kristofferson, David Warner, Estella Warren.

programme.title: The Unbearable Weight of Massive Talent
programme.desc: When his money gets tight, actor Nicolas Cage stumbles upon the ideal scheme to earn quick cash when an eccentric billionaire and longtime admirer invites him to make a paid appearance at his upcoming birthday party. Yet unbeknownst to his fan and secret drug runner, Cage doubles as a CIA informant intent on taking down the kingpin's smuggling operation.

programme.title: The Misfits
programme.desc: This action-adventure sees a notorious thief escape maximum security prison only to find himself lured in by The Misfits, an unconventional group of criminals. He learns that the plan is to undertake a huge gold heist and that the owner of the gold is his enemy - the man who put him behind bars.

programme.title: Masquerade
programme.desc: While home alone, Rose comes face-to-face with the young woman's nightmare when a band of thieving thugs breaks into the home, intent on pilfering her family's collection of valuable artwork. Yet Rose's unexpected appearance causes the home invaders to reassess their plans with murderous intent.

programme.title: The Unholy
programme.desc: This film based on the novel Shrine by James Herbert sees a journalist investigate the supernatural abilities of a young girl after an alleged visit from the Virgin Mary. Traveling to a small New England town, the journalist begins to uncover a more sinister truth surrounding the girl in this gothic horror film.

programme.title: Lila and Eve
programme.desc: Two mothers grieve the murders of their respective children. When the police prove incapable of apprehending those responsible, the women team up to fight crime as vigilantes in this riveting thriller.

programme.title: Thor: The Dark World
programme.desc: In this thrilling fantasy sequel, Thor must team up with his mischievous brother Loki in order to defeat a Dark Elf who's plotting to destroy all of existence. Meanwhile, his true love Jane Foster is possessed by a cosmic force.

programme.title: Jumanji: Welcome to the Jungle
programme.desc: Four teenagers discover a mysterious video game from the '90s while serving detention. When they try to play it, they are transformed into various video-game avatars and dropped into a virtual jungle world in this wild fantasy adventure.

programme.title: Paul Blart: Mall Cop 2
programme.desc: In this farcical sequel, accomplished mall security guard Paul Blart discovers a heist plot while attending an expo in Las Vegas. His investigative prowess is needed to foil the robbery and arrest those responsible.

programme.title: Step Up
programme.desc: It's a battle for control over High Water and dreams of power, fame and fortune. Many secrets are revealed including the real murderer of East-O and the true identity of Saint Clip.

programme.title: Die Hard With a Vengeance
programme.desc: Cop John McClane teams with a shop owner to outwit a terrorist who is making him perform a series of dangerous tasks all around Manhattan.

programme.title: Deck the Halls
programme.desc: In this uproarious holiday farce, an uptight optometrist hits the roof when his neighbor decides to decorate his house with enough Christmas lights to be seen from space.

programme.title: Night at the Museum: Battle of the Smithsonian
programme.desc: Thrills, chills and laughter abound in this adventure comedy about late-night security guard who is put to the test after the exhibits in the Smithsonian come to life and begin wreaking havoc. Determined to save the museum from destruction, Larry takes on a loose T. rex, Attila the Hun and Roman gladiators eager to wage the epic battles of years gone by.

programme.title: A Beautiful Day in the Neighborhood
programme.desc: Lloyd Vogel is tasked with creating a profile of Fred Rogers, the creator and star of the successful children's program Mister Rogers' Neighborhood. He dutifully goes to the studio where his subject is filming his show, and soon enough, he is sitting down with him, asking him probing questions. However, Fred seems to have a different plan in mind. The interviewee suddenly becomes the interviewer, and he starts to help the writer sent for him in unexpected ways.

programme.desc: Patty Duke stars as a runaway farm girl who arrives in Medicine Bow---with a very indignant boyfriend at her heels. Joe: Paul Carr. Pa: Edward Binns. Milt: Tim McIntire. Trampas: Doug McClure. Ryker: Clu Gulager. Tait: Roy Barcroft. Virginian: James Drury.

programme.title: Love Me Tender
programme.desc: Elvis Presley (in his first film) plays a farm boy who stayed at home while his three brothers fought in the Civil War. Debra Paget, Richard Egan. Brett: William Campbell. Gavin: Neville Brand. Mother: Mildred Dunnock. Directed by Robert D. Webb.

programme.desc: Don Siegel directed this tale of Indian-white antagonism, featuring a surprisingly effective Elvis Presley as the half-Indian son of Dolores Del Rio and John McIntire. Barbara Eden, Steve Forrest. Dred: Karl Swenson. Buffalo Horn: Rudolph Acosta. Doc: Ford Rainey. Angus: Richard Jaeckel.

programme.desc: A U.S. marshal (Randolph Scott) encounters danger and romance while trying to recover stolen gold. Forrest Tucker, Dorothy Malone, Frank Faylen, George Macready. Bart: Jeff Corey. Dyke: Charles Kemper. Martin: Tom Powers. Sandy: Jock Mahoney. Gordon Douglas directed.

programme.title: Streets of Laredo
programme.desc: Entertaining action yarn, with William Holden as a happy-go-lucky outlaw who joins the Texas Rangers. Wahoo: William Bendix. Lorn: Macdonald Carey. Rannie: Mona Freeman. Bailey: Stanley Ridges. Leslie Fenton directed.

programme.title: The True Story of Jesse James
programme.desc: Director Nicholas Ray retells the romantic legend of the outlaw's life. Robert Wagner, Jeffrey Hunter. Zee: Hope Lange. Mrs. Samuel: Agnes Moorehead.

programme.title: Bandidas
programme.desc: Salma Hayek and Penélope Cruz star in this ripping Comedy-Western about two Mexican beauties who become outlaws to avenge the deaths of their fathers, who were murdered by a ruthless robber baron (Dwight Yoakam). Sam Shepard and Steve Zahn costar as members of their gang. Directed by Joachim Roenning and Espen Sandberg. Filmmaker Luc Besson co-wrote the script with Robert Mark Kamen. Denis Arndt, Audra Blaser, Karl Braun, Ismael Carlo, Carlos Cervantes.

programme.title: Taza, Son of Cochise
programme.desc: Peace loving Apache Chief Cochise dies, leaving behind two sons - Taza, who shares his father's ideas and Naiche, who threatens to start a war.

programme.title: The Sheriff of Fractured Jaw
programme.desc: A spoof of the Old West with Jayne Mansfield as a saloon belle and Kenneth More as an English gun manufacturer. Henry Hull. Keeno: William Campbell. Lucius: Robert Morley. Jack: Bruce Cabot. The stars provide some fun but the parody doesn't come off. Raoul Walsh directed.

programme.title: Western Union
programme.desc: Bank robber Shaw is reformed and hired as a scout during the construction of a telegraph line through American Indian territory after he saves an engineer's life. Matters are complicated when Shaw encounters a member of his old posse. Based on the novel by Zane Grey.

programme.desc: A gang plans a robbery after hearing the reward in exchange of dead bank robbers.

programme.desc: Stacey Grainger is falsely accused of murdering a highly respected citizen. Cloris Leachman guest stars.

programme.desc: Ten years after they joined forces to survive the zombie apocalypse, a makeshift and relatively dysfunctional family of seasoned zombie slayers travels to the American heartland to square off against other survivors and a variety of newly evolved zombies.

programme.desc: Twenty-two-year-old slacker Scott Pilgrim meets Ramona Flowers, the girl of his dreams, and learns that in order to win her heart he'll have to defeat her seven evil exes in a series of video-game-styled battles.

programme.title: Captain America: The Winter Soldier
programme.desc: Captain America teams with Black Widow and the Falcon to fight the villainous Winter Soldier in this electrifying comic-book adventure. Meanwhile, S.H.I.E.L.D. comes under attack, and a malevolent conspiracy threatens to destabilize the entire planet.

programme.title: My Super Ex-Girlfriend
programme.desc: In this high-flying comedy, Uma Thurman gives a superb performance as a shrewish, possessive superhero who gets dumped by her regular-Joe boyfriend (Luke Wilson), and then decides to use her superpowers to exact revenge on him and his new love (Anna Faris). In a hilarious nod to "Fatal Attraction," Thurman substitutes live great-white-shark sushi for the boiled bunny. Directed by Ivan Reitman and written by Don Payne, who has scripted episodes of "The Simpsons."

Tony Shalhoub, Daryl Mitchell.

programme.desc: The thriller tells the true story of professional climber Pam Bales. Facing an impending blizzard on her way down from Mount Washington, Bales discovers a stranded man in need of help. She undertakes the impossible mission of saving his life. With their lives on the line, they must leave the mountain together before nightfall.

programme.title: Out of Time
programme.desc: Denzel Washington is reunited with his "Devil in a Blue Dress" director, Carl Franklin, for this smart and steamy thriller. He plays a small-town Florida police chief who's been framed for murder and is racing against the clock to find the real killer.

programme.title: Blue Collar
programme.desc: Three Detroit auto factory workers struggling to get by blame their management and the union for their respective situations. They attempt to rob union HQ and uncover evidence linking the union to organized crime.

programme.title: Dead For A Dollar
programme.desc: The western centers on bounty hunter Max Borlund and his fateful confrontation with lifelong nemesis Joe Cribbens. Borlund ventures into Mexico to pursue the kidnapped wife of a wealthy man. But on his journey, he reunites with Cribbens years after he sent him to jail.

programme.title: Bandit
programme.desc: Gilbert Galvan Jr. was known as The Flying Bandit during the 1980s. Gilbert escapes from a prison in Michigan and crosses the border toward Canada. While there, he changes his identity, falls for a social worker, and starts robbing banks. As he gets good at it, he also catches the attention of the media and, eventually, the authorities.

programme.title: Showtime Championship Boxing
programme.desc: Omar Figueroa Jr. (28-2-1) and Sergey Lipinets (16-2-1) clash in Hollywood, Fla. Plus, Alberto Puello vs. Batyr Akhmedov (super lightweights).

programme.title: Wrong Turn
programme.desc: At the Appalachian Trail areas, Jen goes on a hike with friends. They abandon the prescribed trail and wander off into areas that, unknown to them, are occupied by The Foundation. As they are about to find out, this reclusive hidden community zealously guards their privacy and territory—to the death.

programme.title: This Ain't Normal
programme.desc: A deep dive into Boston's inner-city gangs, who target young children to join their ranks in the shady world of organized crime. Later, a profile of the social workers struggling to bring a sense of stability and safety to the youths of Boston.

programme.title: Kevin Garnett: Anything Is Possible
programme.desc: Chronicling Basketball Hall of Famer Kevin Garnett's remarkable career and the pivotal moments that defined it, including his historic jump straight from high school to the NBA. Interviews include Paul Pierce, Doc Rivers, Allen Iverson and Snoop Dogg.

programme.title: NYC Point Gods
programme.desc: Against the backdrop of New York City's epidemic of drugs and crime in the 1980s and 1990s, a unique style of basketball emerged on the city's courts, defined by toughness, talent and swagger.

programme.title: Monstrous
programme.desc: Laura, the mother to seven-year-old Cody, decides to get a new but isolated house near a lake. They are trying to live a new life after escaping Laura's abusive ex-husband. Amidst the appeal of their life and surroundings, a new challenge appears in the form of a monstrous being that emerges from the waters near their property, haunting them in more ways than one.

programme.title: Before I Go to Sleep
programme.desc: In this brilliant mind-bender, a woman wakes up every morning with no memory of her past. She soon makes a shocking discovery that alters her perception of reality and leaves her uncertain of whom to trust.

programme.title: Adrift
programme.desc: A young couple who's sailing 4,000 miles across the Pacific Ocean suddenly find themselves approaching a Category 5 storm with no hope of diverting. After losing consciousness, she awakes stranded on their wrecked boat, but with a determined will to survive.

programme.title: Debug
programme.desc: In this chilling horror film, six computer hackers investigate an abandoned spaceship, and discover a rogue artificial intelligence that's wreaking havoc on the vessel's network.

programme.title: Midnight Sun
programme.desc: A sheltered girl named Katie has a rare disease that makes exposure to sunlight deadly. A chance encounter with her childhood crush, Charlie, leads to an unlikely summer romance that gets complicated when Katie finally reveals her medical condition.

programme.title: Poser
programme.desc: Lennon is an aspiring podcaster who interviews local musicians she admires. As she starts to leave her comfort zone, her interviews lead her to her own musical ambitions. Finding inspiration from the music she admires, Lennon embarks on a journey of self-discovery and enlightenment.

programme.title: Juniper
programme.desc: When a self-destructive teenager is suspended from school and asked to look after his feisty alcoholic grandmother as a punishment, the crazy time they spend together turns his life around.

programme.title: Beanpole
programme.desc: In Leningrad, two young women struggle to ascertain the meaning of their existence as their hope for a renewed future wanes amidst the devastation left by the Second World War. The women dream of restoring peace to their lives, digging through the rubble in search of solid foundations.

programme.title: American Badger
programme.desc: Cold-blooded hitman Badger is tasked with befriending and extracting information from a call girl who has a close connection with an Albanian mob boss. But when the order comes through to kill his new and unlikely ally, Badger finds his life rapidly spiraling out of control.

programme.title: Ziwe
programme.desc: Ziwe finds out what the ladies go through to become the next Miss Universe.

programme.desc: Alice and Tess discover some lies in their relationship; Shane has nowhere else to go to; Dani's romcom fantasy is ruined after she finds something that will test Sophie and Finley's trust; Micah and Maribel struggle with parenthood.

programme.title: Swiss Army Man
programme.desc: A man stranded alone on a deserted island makes one last attempt at escape after a dead body washes up on shore. The talking corpse provides the castaway with a number of unexpected tools, which he'll need if he wants to be reunited with his love.

programme.title: The Humans
programme.desc: On Thanksgiving, the Blakes gathers to celebrate until a series of strange sounds punctuate the revelation of family struggles, including the difficulties of the grandmother's Alzheimer's diagnosis and the daughter's tumultuous coming out. Based on the Tony Award-winning one-act play.

programme.title: Bad Hombres
programme.desc: A documentary following the binational pro baseball team, the Tecolotes de los Dos Laredos, during their 2019 season. Traveling between both of their home stadiums in Mexico & the U.S., the team becomes stuck in the middle of the border wall debate.

programme.title: Moon Manor
programme.desc: The biographical dramedy centers on Jimmy Carrozo's last day on Earth. Battling Alzheimer's, he decides to invite family and friends, along with a personal death doula and an obituary writer, to his very own festive funeral. What follows is an insightful, hilarious look at the joy of living and the art of dying.

programme.title: Demonic
programme.desc: This sci-fi horror tale finds the characters crossing the line of reality and existing in an environment where they begin to question their own existence. The story follows a woman who has long been estranged from her mother. However, during the course of a technological experiment, the paths of the mother and daughter meet again, as secrets of their lives slowly emerge while supernatural demons are accidentally unleashed by the process.

programme.title: Monkey Shines
programme.desc: An experiment provides a simian aide that has been trained to assist a quadriplegic, but the man feels a strange connection with the mammal, which is exhibiting "feelings."

programme.title: Rose: A Love Story
programme.desc: Rose struggles with an illness that makes her thirst for blood, forcing her and her husband to isolate themselves in the woods.

programme.title: Twilight
programme.desc: Stephenie Meyer's romantic and suspenseful best seller that started the phenomenon comes to life in this action-packed chronicle of the modern-day love story between a teenage girl and a vampire. Kristen Stewart and Robert Pattinson star. Billy Burke, Peter Facinelli, Elizabeth Reaser. Directed by Catherine Hardwicke.

programme.title: The Twilight Saga: New Moon
programme.desc: This thrilling second installment of the popular "Twilight" saga finds Bella Swan in pieces after her vampire boyfriend leaves town. She soon reconnects with a childhood friend and realizes he's hiding a dark secret that may hold the key to her survival.

programme.title: Nothing Compares
programme.desc: An intimate look into the life of controversial Irish singer-songwriter Sinéad O'Connor. Beginning with the release of her debut album in 1987, the narrative charts six years in O'Connor's career filled with rebellion, iconoclasm, and creativity as the musician strove to rewrite the script of mainstream music and femininity in the face of rampant sociopolitical and sociocultural change.

programme.title: Meet Me in the Bathroom
programme.desc: An in-depth look into the early 2000s New York City rock scene. In a time when many thought the city would no longer produce iconic rock bands, a rebirth of sorts swept through the city. Following bands like The Strokes, LCD Soundsystem, Yeah Yeah Yeahs, and more, this documentary takes you back to where it all started. Based on the book written by Lizzie Goodman.

programme.desc: This delightfully offbeat comedy centers on a single woman who decides to conceive via artificial insemination. But seven years later, she reunites with a friend and comes to question the child's paternity after he recalls a last-minute mix-up involving the sperm sample she used.

programme.desc: In this hilarious comedy, a past-his-prime Latin lover moves in with his sister and her son after his wife leaves him. As he teaches his nephew how to play the game of seduction, he vows to return to his lifestyle of being a kept man for an older woman.

Kate Hudson, Billy Crudup, Frances McDormand.

programme.title: Ziwe
programme.desc: Ziwe finds out what the ladies go through to become the next Miss Universe.

programme.title: The Lighthouse
programme.desc: In the midst of a bracing storm, two lighthouse keepers fight to maintain their sanity while stranded on a strange and isolated New England island in the 1890s. But as the storm continues, the two men are forced to confront their true nature.

programme.title: The Novice
programme.desc: Alex Dall, a university student, seems to be obsessing about rowing. As a member of her school's rowing team, she is seen working herself to the bones as a novice team member, often sacrificing her academics and other aspects of her life. Things change a bit when she meets Dani, a teacher's assistant who later becomes her girlfriend. However, even with love now in the equation, Alex still seems to be heading toward self-destruction in her life obsessions.

Directed by Victor Salva from a script by Kevin Bernhardt, who adapted the autobiographical best seller "Way of the Peaceful Warrior" by Dan Millman, the character played by Mechlowicz.

In small-town Illinois, aspiring filmmaker Pat Johnson contends with the pitfalls of adolescence, from bullying to young love. However, when he discovers a new science fiction film, he may find himself at the center of events much greater than himself. Based on true events.

programme.title: Something's Gotta Give
programme.desc: Jack Nicholson and Diane Keaton are dynamic in this witty romantic comedy. Nicholson plays an aging Lothario with a young girlfriend. He meets his soul mate, however, when he's introduced to his lover's mother, a playwright who can't stand the sight of him.

programme.title: Bad Santa

programme.title: Bad Santa 2
programme.desc: In this hysterical sequel to the 2003 cult hit, professional thief and Santa impersonator Willie Soke teams up with his dwarf sidekick and hell-raising mother for his latest heist: robbing a Chicago charity during Christmas Eve. However, he begins to have second thoughts about the caper when he falls for the charity's director.

programme.title: Ernest Saves Christmas
programme.desc: Ernest scrambles to find a successor for Santa Claus in this Yuletide comedy.

programme.desc: A partying troublemaker learns about holiday spirit when a judge sentences him to community service as a referee for a kids team.

programme.title: Angels Sing
programme.desc: A man is forced to confront his past during the holiday season.

programme.title: Wonderful Time of the Year, A
programme.desc: The Marsh family is getting together for their first Christmas Eve after three years of pandemic lockdown.

programme.title: National Lampoon's Christmas Vacation 2: Cousin Eddie's Island Adventure
programme.desc: When Cousin Eddie is fired from his job at a nuclear facility and replaced by a monkey, his boss worries he will sue and offers his family a Christmas vacation in the South pacific. They get shipwrecked on a small island and brave the elements together.

programme.title: A Very British Christmas
programme.desc: American opera singer Jessica Bailey's flight to her concert in Vienna becomes delayed in a remote area of England. The only place to stay is a bed-and-breakfast in Pine Falls, an enchanting village run by a young, handsome, widower Andrew with his precocious daughter, Katie. Spending time with them allows romance to blossom as Jessica learns he is an amazing artist, but a struggling entrepreneur. With snowflakes in the air, Jessica faces a choice: career or love.

programme.title: Bridget Jones's Diary
programme.desc: Texan Renee Zellweger boasts a perfect English accent in this delightful adaptation of Helen Fielding's novel. She plays Bridget, a London "singleton" desperate to lose weight, cut down on her vices and find Mr. Right. The film chronicles her romantic entanglements with two gents: her playboy boss (Hugh Grant) and a snooty lawyer (Colin Firth). Jim Broadbent, Gemma Jones.

programme.title: Mr. Malcolm's List
programme.desc: Jeremy Malcolm is the most sought bachelor in the English countryside. Rumors surface of a list that lays out all the perfect qualities for Mr. Malcolm's future wife. A suitor from out of town hears about Mr. Malcolm and is convinced she can win him over. Based on the novel Mr. Malcolm's List by Suzanne Allain.

programme.title: Hello, My Name Is Doris
programme.desc: Sixtysomething spinster Doris tries to woo her much-younger coworker John in this charming comedy-drama. To her surprise, she is welcomed into John's social circle, although her new and exciting life strains her relationship with her best friend.

programme.title: Contagion
programme.desc: In this intense ensemble thriller about a virus that quickly becomes a global pandemic, a husband (Matt Damon) copes with the sudden death of his wife, while a doctor (Kate Winslet) puts herself at risk to find a cure and an activist blogger (Jude Law) stokes society's paranoia. Directed by Steven Soderbergh.

programme.title: Club C. Presents a Queer Comedy Extravaganza!
programme.desc: Emmy nominee and Tony winner Alan C. hosts this cabaret-style gathering featuring seven up-and-coming queer comedians that represent not only the diversity of the queer spectrum, but also of comedy styling, from stand-up to characters to musical performances. The 75-minute special features Joe Castle Baker, Julia Shiplett, duo Zach Teague & Drew Lausch, Nori Reed, Pat Regan, and Larry Owens.

programme.title: Sheryl
programme.desc: With 50 million albums sold worldwide and nine Grammy awards under her belt, Sheryl Crow can be considered as one of the most successful artists in American music. The documentary film Sheryl centers around the life and times of this icon, employing intimate interviews, camcorder footage, and archival materials to paint a complete image of her life—from her humble beginnings, impressive career breakthrough, medical challenges, and sustained success.

programme.title: Rachel Getting Married
programme.desc: A wayward young woman leaves rehab to attend her older sister's wedding, wreaking emotional havoc on the idyllic weekend gathering. Anne Hathaway ("The Devil Wears Prada") gives a superb performance in this exuberant dramedy from director Jonathan Demme ("The Silence of the Lambs"). Rosemarie DeWitt, Bill Irwin, Tunde Adebimpe, Debra Winger.

programme.title: When Joan Kissed Barbra
programme.desc: Before Joan Rivers and Barbra Streisand were famous, they were in a play together. Rivers demanded she be cast without even reading the script. The result: the role she was given called for a love scene between herself and Streisand.

programme.title: The Dry
programme.desc: It takes Aaron Falk 20 years to return to his hometown, and it is because Luke, one of his childhood friends, has died. Luke has killed himself after murdering his family, falling victim to the madness that is going through their area. As Falk stays to investigate the case, he opens up an old wound: the death of Ellie. He realizes that a connection can be made between the two crimes, but as he does, he finds himself needing to prove not only Luke's, but also his innocence.

programme.title: Sisters with Transistors
programme.desc: This music documentary spotlights the overlooked history of the first generation of female pioneers and innovators in electronic music. By using archival footage and audio, it explores how they embraced synthesizers and sampling — while struggling in a male-dominated space and a generally sexist era — and made a memorable impact on popular culture.
